                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="279" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">A Louer that kills himselfe most gallantly for
                                    <tei-lb n="280" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>loue.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="281" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">That will aske some teares in the true perfor­
                                    <tei-lb n="282" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ming of it: if I do it, let the audience looke to their eies: 
                                    <tei-lb n="283" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>I will mooue stormes; I will condole in some measure. 
                                    <tei-lb n="284" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>To the rest yet, my chiefe humour is for a tyrant. I could 
                                    <tei-lb n="285" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>play <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ercles</tei-hi> rarely, or a part to teare a Cat in, to make all 
                                    <tei-lb n="286" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>split the raging Rocks; and shiuering shocks shall break 
                                    <tei-lb n="287" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>the locks of prison gates, and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Phibbus</tei-hi> carre shall shine 
                                    <tei-lb n="288" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>from farre, and make and marre the foolish Fates. This 
                                    <tei-lb n="289" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>was lofty. Now name the rest of the Players. This 
                                    <tei-lb n="290" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ercles</tei-hi> vaine, a tyrants vaine: a louer is more condo­
                                    <tei-lb n="291" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ling.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="292" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Francis Flute</tei-hi> the Bellowes‑mender.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Flu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="293" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Heere <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter Quince</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="294" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You must take <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> on you.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Flut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="295" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">What is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi>, a wandring Knight?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="296" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">It is the Lady that <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi> must loue.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Flut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="297" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Nay faith, let not mee play a woman, I haue a 
                                    <tei-lb n="298" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>beard comming.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qui.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="299" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">That's all one, you shall play it in a Maske, and
                                    <tei-lb n="300" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>you may speake as small as you will.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="301" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">And I may hide my face, let me play <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> too:
                                <tei-lb n="302" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Ile speake in a monstrous little voyce; <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisne, Thisne</tei-hi>, ah
                                <tei-lb n="303" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi> my louer deare, thy <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> deare, and Lady 
                                <tei-lb n="304" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>deare.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="305" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No no, you must play <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi>, and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Flute</tei-hi>, you
                                <tei-lb n="306" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="307" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well, proceed.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="308" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin Starueling</tei-hi> the Taylor.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Star.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="309" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Heere <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter Quince</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quince.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="310" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin Starueling</tei-hi>, you must play <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi>
                                    <tei-lb n="311" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>mother?
                                    <tei-lb n="312" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tom Snowt</tei-hi>, the Tinker.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snowt.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="313" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Heere <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter Quince</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="314" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi> father; my self, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> father;
                                    <tei-lb n="315" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Snugge</tei-hi> the Ioyner, you the Lyons part: and I hope there 
                                    <tei-lb n="316" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>is a play fitted.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-snu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snug.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="317" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Haue you the Lions part written? pray you if 
                                    <tei-lb n="318" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>be, giue it me, for I am slow of studie.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="319" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You may doe it <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">extemporie</tei-hi>, for it is nothing 
                                    <tei-lb n="320" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>but roaring.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="321" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Let mee play the Lyon too, I will roare that I 
                                    <tei-lb n="322" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>will doe any mans heart good to heare me. I will roare, 
                                    <tei-lb n="323" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>that I will make the Duke say, Let him roare againe, let 
                                    <tei-lb n="324" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>him roare againe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="325" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">If you should doe it too terribly, you would 
                                    <tei-lb n="326" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fright the Dutchesse and the Ladies, that they would 
                                    <tei-lb n="327" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>shrike, and that were enough to hang vs all.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-all" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">All.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="328" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">That would hang vs euery mothers sonne.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bottome.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="329" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I graunt you friends, if that you should 
                                    <tei-lb n="330" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fright the Ladies out of their Wittes, they would 
                                    <tei-lb n="331" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>haue no more discretion but to hang vs: but I will ag­
                                    <tei-lb n="332" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>grauate my voyce so, that I will roare you as gently as 
                                    <tei-lb n="333" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>any sucking Doue; I will roare and 'twere any Nightin­
                                    <tei-lb n="334" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>gale.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="335" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You can play no part but <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, for <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pira­</tei-hi>
                           <tei-fw type="sig" place="footCentre" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">N2</tei-fw> 
                           <tei-fw type="catchword" rend="italic" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place rend type">mus</tei-fw> 
                           <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0168-0.jpg" n="148" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/> 
                           <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw> 
                           <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                    <tei-lb n="336" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">mus</tei-hi> is a sweet‑fac'd man, a proper man as one shall see in 
                                    <tei-lb n="337" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>a summers day; a most louely Gentleman‑like man, ther­
                                    <tei-lb n="338" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fore you must needs play <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="339" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well, I will vndertake it. What beard were I 
                                    <tei-lb n="340" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>best to play it in?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="341" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Why, what you will.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="342" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I will discharge it, in either your straw‑colour
                                    <tei-lb n="343" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>beard, your orange tawnie beard, your purple in graine
                                    <tei-lb n="344" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>beard, or your French‑crowne colour'd beard, your per­
                                    <tei-lb n="345" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fect yellow.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="346" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Some of your French Crownes haue no haire 
                                    <tei-lb n="347" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>at all, and then you will play bare‑fac'd. But masters here
                                    <tei-lb n="348" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>are your parts, and I am to intreat you, request you, and 
                                    <tei-lb n="349" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>desire you, to con them by too morrow night: and meet 
                                    <tei-lb n="350" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>me in the palace wood, a mile without the Towne, by
                                    <tei-lb n="351" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Moone‑light, there we will rehearse: for if we meete in 
                                    <tei-lb n="352" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>the Citie, we shalbe dog'd with company, and our deui­
                                    <tei-lb n="353" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ses knowne. In the meane time, I wil draw a bil of pro­ 
                                    <tei-lb n="354" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>perties, such as our play wants. I pray you faile me not.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bottom.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="355" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">We will meete, and there we may rehearse 
                                    <tei-lb n="356" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>more obscenely and couragiously. Take paines, be per­
                                    <tei-lb n="357" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fect, adieu.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="358" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">At the Dukes oake we meete.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="359" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Enough, hold or cut bow‑strings.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exeunt.</tei-stage>
                        </tei-div>
                            </tei-div>
                            <tei-div type="act" n="2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                <tei-div type="scene" n="1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                    <tei-head rend="italic center" data-origname="head" data-origatts="rend">Actus Secundus.</tei-head>
                                    <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 2, Scene 1]</tei-head>    
                            <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                    <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter a Fairie at one doore, and Robin good­
                                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>fellow at another.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="360" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How now spirit, whether wander you?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="361" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ouer hil, ouer dale, through bush, through briar,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="362" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ouer parke, ouer pale, through flood, through fire,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="363" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I do wander euerie where, swifter then y<tei-hi rend="superscript" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">e</tei-hi> Moons sphere;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="364" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I serue the Fairy Queene, to dew her orbs vpon the <tei-lb rend="turnunder" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="rend" data-empty=""/>(green.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="365" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Cowslips tall, her pensioners bee,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="366" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In their gold coats, spots you see,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="367" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Those be Rubies, Fairie fauors,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="368" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In those freckles, liue their sauors,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="369" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I must go seeke some dew drops heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="370" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And hang a pearle in euery cowslips eare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="371" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Farewell thou Lob of spirits, Ile be gon,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="372" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Our Queene and all her Elues come heere anon.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="373" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The King doth keepe his Reuels here to night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="374" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Take heed the Queene come not within his sight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="375" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi> is passing fell and wrath,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="376" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Because that she, as her attendant, hath</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="377" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A louely boy stolne from an Indian King,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="378" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">She neuer had so sweet a changeling,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="379" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And iealous <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi> would haue the childe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="380" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Knight of his traine, to trace the Forrests wilde.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="381" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But she (perforce) with‑holds the loued boy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="382" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Crownes him with flowers, and makes him all her ioy.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="383" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now they neuer meete in groue, or greene,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="384" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By fountaine cleere, or spangled star‑light sheene,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="385" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But they do square, that all their Elues for feare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="386" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Creepe into Acorne cups and hide them there.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="387" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Either I mistake your shape and making quite,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="388" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or else you are that shrew'd and knauish spirit</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="389" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Cal'd Robin Good‑fellow. Are you not hee,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="390" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That frights the maidens of the Villagree,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="391" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Skim milke, and sometimes labour in the querne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="392" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And bootlesse make the breathlesse huswife cherne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="393" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sometime make the drinke to beare no barme,</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="394" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Misleade night‑wanderers, laughing at their harme,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="395" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Those that Hobgoblin call you, and sweet Pucke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="396" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You do their worke, and they shall haue good lucke.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="397" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Are not you he?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="398" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou speak'st aright;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="399" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am that merrie wanderer of the night:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="400" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I iest to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>, and make him smile,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="401" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I a fat and beane‑fed horse beguile,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="402" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neighing in likenesse of a silly foale,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="403" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sometime lurke I in a Gossips bole,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="404" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In very likenesse of a roasted crab:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="405" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And when she drinkes, against her lips I bob,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="406" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And on her withered dewlop poure the Ale.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="407" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The wisest Aunt telling the saddest tale,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="408" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sometime for three‑foot stoole, mistaketh me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="409" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then slip I from her bum, downe topples she,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="410" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And tailour cries, and fals into a coffe.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="411" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And then the whole quire hold their hips, and loffe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="412" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And waxen in their mirth, and neeze, and sweare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="413" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A merrier houre vvas neuer wasted there.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="414" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But roome Fairy, heere comes <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Fair.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="415" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And heere my Mistris:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="416" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Would that he vvere gone.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter the King of Fairies at one doore with his traine, 
                                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and the Queene at another with hers.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="417" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ill met by Moone‑light,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="418" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Proud <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tytania</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="419" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, iealous <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>? Fairy skip hence.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="420" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I haue forsworne his bed and companie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="421" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tarrie rash Wanton; am not I thy Lord?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="422" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then I must be thy Lady: but I know</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="423" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou vvast stolne away from Fairy Land,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="424" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And in the shape of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Corin</tei-hi>, sate all day,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="425" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Playing on pipes of Corne, and versing loue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="426" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To amorous <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Phillida</tei-hi>. Why art thou heere</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="427" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come from the farthest steepe of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">India</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="428" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But that forsooth the bouncing <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Amazon</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="429" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Your buskin'd Mistresse, and your Warrior loue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="430" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi> must be Wedded; and you come,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="431" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To giue their bed ioy and prosperitie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="432" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How canst thou thus for shame <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tytania</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="433" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Glance at my credite, vvith <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hippolita</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="434" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Knowing I knovv thy loue to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="435" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Didst thou not leade him through the glimmering night</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="436" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peregenia</tei-hi>, whom he rauished?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="437" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And make him vvith faire Eagles breake his faith</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="438" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ariadne</tei-hi>, and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Atiopa</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Que.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="439" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These are the forgeries of iealousie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="440" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And neuer since the middle Summers spring</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="441" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Met vve on hil, in dale, forrest, or mead,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="442" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By paued fountaine, or by rushie brooke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="443" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or in the beached margent of the sea,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="444" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To dance our ringlets to the whistling Winde,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="445" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But vvith thy braules thou hast disturb'd our sport.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="446" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therefore the Windes, piping to vs in vaine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="447" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As in reuenge, haue suck'd vp from the sea</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="448" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Contagious fogges: Which falling in the Land,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="449" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hath euerie petty Riuer made so proud,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="450" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That they haue ouer‑borne their Continents.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="451" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Oxe hath therefore stretch'd his yoake in vaine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="452" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Ploughman lost his sweat, and the greene Corne</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="453" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hath rotted, ere his youth attain'd a beard:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="454" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The fold stands empty in the drowned field,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="455" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And Crowes are fatted vvith the murrion flocke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">The</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0169-0.jpg" n="149" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="456" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The nine mens Morris is fild vp with mud,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="457" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the queint Mazes in the wanton greene,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="458" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For lacke of tread are vndistinguishable.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="459" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The humane mortals want their winter heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="460" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No night is now with hymne or caroll blest;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="461" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therefore the Moone (the gouernesse of floods)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="462" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pale in her anger, washes all the aire;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="463" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That Rheumaticke diseases doe abound.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="464" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And through this distemperature, we see</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="465" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The seasons alter; hoared headed frosts</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="466" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fall in the fresh lap of the crimson Rose,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="467" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And on old <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hyems</tei-hi> chinne and Icie crowne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="468" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">An odorous Chaplet of sweet Sommer buds</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="469" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is as in mockry set. The Spring, the Sommer,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="470" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The childing Autumne, angry Winter change</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="471" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Their wonted Liueries, and the mazed world,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="472" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By their increase, now knowes not which is which;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="473" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And this same progeny of euills,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="474" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Comes from our debate, from our dissention,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="475" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We are their parents and originall.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ober.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="476" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Do you amend it then, it lies in you,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="477" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why should <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Titania</tei-hi> crosse her <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="478" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I do but beg a little changeling boy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="479" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To be my Henchman.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="480" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Set your heart at rest,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="481" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Fairy land buyes not the childe of me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="482" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">His mother was a Votresse of my Order,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="483" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And in the spiced <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Indian</tei-hi> aire, by night</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="484" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Full often hath she gossipt by my side,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="485" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sat with me on <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Neptunes</tei-hi> yellow sands,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="486" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Marking th'embarked traders on the flood,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="487" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When we haue laught to see the sailes conceiue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="488" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And grow big bellied with the wanton winde:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="489" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which she with pretty and with swimming gate,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="490" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Following (her wombe then rich with my yong squire)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="491" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Would imitate, and saile vpon the Land,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="492" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To fetch me trifles, and returne againe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="493" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As from a voyage, rich with merchandize.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="494" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But she being mortall, of that boy did die,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="495" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And for her sake I doe reare vp her boy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="496" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And for her sake I will not part with him.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="497" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How long within this wood intend you stay?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="498" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Perchance till after <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi> wedding day.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="499" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If you will patiently dance in our Round,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="500" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And see our Moone‑light reuels, goe with vs;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="501" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If not, shun me and I will spare your haunts.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="502" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Giue me that boy, and I will goe with thee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="503" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Not for thy Fairy Kingdome. Fairies away:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="504" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We shall chide downe right, if I longer stay.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exeunt.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="505" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wel, go thy way: thou shalt not from this groue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="506" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Till I torment thee for this iniury.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="507" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My gentle <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pucke</tei-hi> come hither; thou remembrest</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="508" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Since once I sat vpon a promontory,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="509" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And heard a Meare‑maide on a Dolphins backe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="510" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vttering such dulcet and harmonious breath,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="511" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That the rude sea grew ciuill at her song,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="512" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And certaine starres shot madly from their Spheares,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="513" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To heare the Sea‑maids musicke.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puc.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="514" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I remember.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="515" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That very time I say (but thou couldst not<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">)</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="516" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Flying betweene the cold Moone and the earth,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="517" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cupid</tei-hi> all arm'd; a certaine aime he tooke</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="518" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">At a faire Vestall, throned by the West,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="519" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And loos'd his loue‑shaft smartly from his bow,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="520" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As it should pierce a hundred thousand hearts,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="521" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But I might see young <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cupids</tei-hi> fiery shaft</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="522" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Quencht in the chaste beames of the watry Moone;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="523" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the imperiall Votresse passed on,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="524" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In maiden meditation, fancy free.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="525" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yet markt I where the bolt of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cupid</tei-hi> fell.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="526" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It fell vpon a little westerne flower;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="527" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Before, milke‑white; now purple with loues wound,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="528" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And maidens call it, Loue in idlenesse.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="529" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fetch me that flower; the hearb I shew'd thee once,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="530" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The iuyce of it, on sleeping eye‑lids laid,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="531" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Will make or man or woman madly dote</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="532" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vpon the next liue creature that it sees.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="533" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fetch me this hearbe, and be thou heere againe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="534" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ere the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Leuiathan</tei-hi> can swim a league.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pucke.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="535" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile put a girdle about the earth, in forty mi­
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>nutes.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ober.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="536" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hauing once this iuyce,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="537" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile watch <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Titania</tei-hi>, when she is asleepe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="538" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And drop the liquor of it in her eyes:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="539" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The next thing when she waking lookes vpon,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="540" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(Be it on Lyon, Beare, or Wolfe, or Bull,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="541" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">On medling Monkey, or on busie Ape)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="542" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Shee shall pursue it, with the soule of loue.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="543" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And ere I take this charme off from her sight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="544" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(As I can take it with another hearbe<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">)</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="545" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile make her render vp her Page to me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="546" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But who comes heere? I am inuisible,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="547" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I will ouer‑heare their conference.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Demetrius, Helena
                                following him.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Deme.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="548" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I loue thee not, therefore pursue me not,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="549" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, and faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="550" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The one Ile stay, the other stayeth me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="551" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou toldst me they were stolne into this wood;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="552" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And heere am I, and wood within this wood,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="553" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Because I cannot meet my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="554" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hence, get thee gone, and follow me no more.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="555" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You draw me, you hard‑hearted Adamant,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="556" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But yet you draw not Iron, for my heart</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="557" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is true as steele. Leaue you your power to draw,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="558" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I shall haue no power to follow you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Deme.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="559" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Do I entice you? do I speake you faire?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="560" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or rather doe I not in plainest truth,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="561" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tell you I doe not, nor I cannot loue you?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="562" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And euen for that doe I loue thee the more;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="563" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am your spaniell, and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="564" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The more you beat me, I will fawne on you.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="565" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vse me but as your spaniell; spurne me, strike me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="566" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neglect me, lose me; onely giue me leaue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="567" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(Vnworthy as I am) to follow you.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="568" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What worser place can I beg in your loue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="569" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(And yet a place of high respect with me)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="570" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then to be vsed as you doe your dogge.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="571" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tempt not too much the hatred of my spirit,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="572" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For I am sicke when I do looke on thee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="573" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I am sicke when I looke not on you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="574" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You doe impeach your modesty too much,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="575" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To leaue the Citty, and commit your selfe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="576" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Into the hands of one that loues you not,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="577" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To trust the opportunity of night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="578" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the ill counsell of a desert place,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="579" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With the rich worth of your virginity.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="580" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Your vertue is my priuiledge: for that</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="581" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It is not night when I doe see your face.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="582" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therefore I thinke I am not in the night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="583" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nor doth this wood lacke worlds of company,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="sig" place="footCentre" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">N3</tei-fw>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">For</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0170-0.jpg" n="150" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="584" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For you in my respect are <tei-choice data-origname="choice">
                                    <tei-orig data-origname="orig">nll</tei-orig>
                                    <tei-corr data-origname="corr">all</tei-corr>
                                </tei-choice> the world.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="585" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then how can it be said I am alone,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="586" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When all the world is heere to looke on me?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="587" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile run from thee, and hide me in the brakes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="588" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And leaue thee to the mercy of wilde beasts.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="589" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The wildest hath not such a heart as you;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="590" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Runne when you will, the story shall be chang'd:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="591" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Apollo</tei-hi> flies, and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Daphne</tei-hi> holds the chase;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="592" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Doue pursues the Griffin, the milde Hinde</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="593" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Makes speed to catch the Tyger. Bootlesse speede,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="594" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When cowardise pursues, and valour flies.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Demet.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="595" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I will not stay thy questions, let me go;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="596" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or if thou follow me, doe not beleeue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="597" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But I shall doe thee mischiefe in the wood.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="598" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, in the Temple, in the Towne, and Field</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="599" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You doe me mischiefe. Fye <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="600" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Your wrongs doe set a scandall on my sexe:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="601" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We cannot fight for loue, as men may doe;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="602" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We should be woo'd, and were not made to wooe.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="603" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I follow thee, and make a heauen of hell,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="604" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To die vpon the hand I loue so well.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="605" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fare thee well Nymph, ere he do leaue this groue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="606" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou shalt flie him, and he shall seeke thy loue.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="607" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hast thou the flower there? Welcome wanderer.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="608" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, there it is.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="609" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I pray thee giue it me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="610" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I know a banke where the wilde time blowes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="611" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where Oxslips and the nodding Violet growes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="612" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Quite ouer‑cannoped with luscious woodbine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="613" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With sweet muske roses, and with Eglantine;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="614" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There sleepes <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tytania</tei-hi>, sometime of the night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="615" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lul'd in these flowers, with dances and delight:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="616" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And there the snake throwes her enammel'd skinne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="617" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Weed wide enough to rap a Fairy in.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="618" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And with the iuyce of this Ile streake her eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="619" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And make her full of hatefull fantasies.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="620" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Take thou some of it, and seek through this groue;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="621" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A sweet <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> Lady is in loue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="622" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With a disdainefull youth: annoint his eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="623" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But doe it when the next thing he espies,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="624" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">May be the Lady. Thou shalt know the man,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="625" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> garments he hath on.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="626" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Effect it with some care, that he may proue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="627" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">More fond on her, then she vpon her loue;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="628" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And looke thou meet me ere the first Cocke crow.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="629" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Feare not my Lord, your seruant shall do so.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            </tei-div>
                                    <tei-div type="scene" n="2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                        <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 2, Scene 2]</tei-head>  
                                        <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Queene of Fairies, with her traine.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Queen.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="630" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come, now a Roundell, and a Fairy song;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="631" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then for the third part of a minute hence,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="632" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Some to kill Cankers in the muske rose buds,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="633" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Some warre with Reremise, for their leathern wings,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="634" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To make my small Elues coates, and some keepe backe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="635" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The clamorous Owle that nightly hoots and wonders</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="636" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">At our queint spirits: Sing me now asleepe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="637" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then to your offices, and let me rest.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Fairies Sing.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="638" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">You spotted Snakes with double tongue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="639" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Thorny Hedgehogges be not seene,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="640" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Newts and blinde wormes do no wrong,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="641" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Come not neere our Fairy Queene.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="642" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Philomele with melodie,</tei-l>
                            <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="643" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Sing in your sweet Lullaby.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="644" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Lulla, lulla, lullaby, lulla, lulla, lullaby,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="645" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Neuer harme, nor spell, nor charme,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="646" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Come our louely Lady nye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="647" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">So good night with Lullaby.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai.2" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">2. Fairy.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="648" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Weauing Spiders come not heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="649" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Hence you long leg'd Spinners, hence:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="650" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Beetles blacke approach not neere;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="651" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Worme nor Snayle doe no offence.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="652" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Philomele with melody, &c.</tei-l>
                                </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai.1" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">1. Fairy.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="653" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Hence away, now all is well;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="654" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">One aloofe, stand Centinell.</tei-l>
