                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Shee sleepes.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Oberon.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ober.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="655" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What thou seest when thou dost wake,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="656" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Doe it for thy true Loue take:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="657" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Loue and languish for his sake.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="658" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Be it Ounce, or Catte, or Beare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="659" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pard, or Boare with bristled haire,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="660" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In thy eye that shall appeare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="661" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou wak'st, it is thy deare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="662" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wake when some vile thing is neere.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Lisander and
                                Hermia.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="663" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Faire loue, you faint with wandring in y<tei-hi rend="superscript" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">e</tei-hi> woods,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="664" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And to speake troth I haue forgot our way:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="665" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wee'll rest vs <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, if you thinke it good,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="666" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And tarry for the comfort of the day.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="667" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Be it so <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>; finde you out a bed,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="668" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For I vpon this banke will rest my head.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="669" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">One turfe shall serue as pillow for vs both,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="670" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">One heart, one bed, two bosomes, and one troth.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="671" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nay good <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, for my sake my deere</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="672" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lie further off yet, doe not lie so neere.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="673" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O take the sence sweet, of my innocence,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="674" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Loue takes the meaning, in loues conference,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="675" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I meane that my heart vnto yours is knit,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="676" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So that but one heart can you make of it.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="677" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Two bosomes interchanged with an oath,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="678" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So then two bosomes, and a single troth.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="679" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then by your side, no bed‑roome me deny,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="680" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For lying so, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, I doe not lye.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="681" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> riddles very prettily;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="682" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now much beshrew my manners and my pride,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="683" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> meant to say, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> lied.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="684" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But gentle friend, for loue and courtesie</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="685" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lie further off, in humane modesty,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="686" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Such separation, as may well be said,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="687" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Becomes a vertuous batchelour, and a maide,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="688" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So farre be distant, and good night sweet friend;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="689" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy loue nere alter, till thy sweet life end.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="690" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Amen, amen, to that faire prayer, say I,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="691" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And then end life, when I end loyalty:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="692" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Heere is my bed, sleepe giue thee all his rest.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="693" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With halfe that wish, the wishers eyes be prest.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                                        <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                                        <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">They sleepe.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="694" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Through the Forest haue I gone,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="695" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> finde I none,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="696" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">One whose eyes I might approue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="697" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This flowers force in stirring loue.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="698" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Night and silence: who is heere?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="699" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Weedes of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> he doth weare:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="700" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This is he (my master said)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="701" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Despised the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> maide:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="702" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And heere the maiden sleeping sound,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">On</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0171-0.jpg" n="151" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="703" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">On the danke and durty ground.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="704" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pretty soule, she durst not lye</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="705" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neere this lacke‑loue, this kill‑curtesie.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="706" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Churle, vpon thy eyes I throw</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="707" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">All the power this charme doth owe:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="708" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou wak'st, let loue forbid</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="709" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sleepe his seate on thy eye‑lid.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="710" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So awake when I am gone:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="711" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For I must now to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Demetrius and Helena running.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="712" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stay, though thou kill me, sweete <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">De.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="713" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I charge thee hence, and do not haunt me thus.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="714" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O wilt thou darkling leaue me? do not so.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">De.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="715" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stay on thy perill, I alone will goe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Demetrius.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="716" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O I am out of breath, in this fond chace,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="717" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The more my prayer, the lesser is my grace,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="718" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Happy is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, wheresoere she lies;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="719" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For she hath blessed and attractiue eyes.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="720" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How came her eyes so bright? Not with salt teares.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="721" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If so, my eyes are oftner washt then hers.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="722" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No, no, I am as vgly as a Beare;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="723" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For beasts that meete me, runne away for feare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="724" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therefore no maruaile, though <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="725" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Doe as a monster, flie my presence thus.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="726" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What wicked and dissembling glasse of mine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="727" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Made me compare with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermias</tei-hi> sphery eyne?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="728" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But who is here? <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> on the ground;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="729" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Deade or asleepe? I see no bloud, no wound,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="730" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, if you liue, good sir awake.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="731" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And run through fire I will for thy sweet sake.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="732" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Transparent <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>, nature her shewes art,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="733" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That through thy bosome makes me see thy heart.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="734" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>? oh how fit a word</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="735" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is that vile name, to perish on my sword!</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="736" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Do not say so <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, say not so:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="737" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What though he loue your <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>? Lord, what though?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="738" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yet <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> still loues you; then be content.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="739" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Content with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>? No, I do repent</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="740" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The tedious minutes I with her haue spent.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="741" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Not <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, but <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi> now I loue;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="742" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Who will not change a Rauen for a Doue?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="743" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The will of man is by his reason sway'd:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="744" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And reason saies you are the worthier Maide.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="745" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Things growing are not ripe vntill their season;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="746" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So I being yong, till now ripe not to reason,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="747" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And touching now the point of humane skill,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="748" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Reason becomes the Marshall to my will,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="749" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And leades me to your eyes, where I orelooke</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="750" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Loues stories, written in Loues richest booke.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="751" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wherefore was I to this keene mockery borne?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="752" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When at your hands did I deserue this scorne?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="753" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ist not enough, ist not enough, yong man,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="754" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I did neuer, no nor neuer can,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="755" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Deserue a sweete looke from <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi> eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="756" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But you must flout my insufficiency?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="757" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Good troth you do me wrong (good‑sooth you do)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="758" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In such disdainfull manner, me to wooe.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="759" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But fare you well; perforce I must confesse,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="760" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I thought you Lord of more true gentlenesse.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="761" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Oh, that a Lady of one man refus'd,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="762" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Should of another therefore be abus'd.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="763" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">She sees not <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>: <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> sleepe thou there,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="764" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And neuer maist thou come <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> neere;</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="765" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For as a surfeit of the sweetest things</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="766" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The deepest loathing to the stomacke brings:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="767" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or as the heresies that men do leaue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="768" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Are hated most of those that did deceiue:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="769" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So thou, my surfeit, and my heresie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="770" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of all be hated; but the most of me;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="771" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And all my powers addresse your loue and might,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="772" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To honour <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helen</tei-hi>, and to be her Knight.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="773" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Helpe me <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, helpe me; do thy best</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="774" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To plucke this crawling serpent from my brest.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="775" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Aye me, for pitty; what a dreame was here?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="776" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> looke, how I do quake with feare:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="777" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Me‑thought a serpent eate my heart away,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="778" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And yet sat smiling at his cruell prey.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="779" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, what remoou'd? <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, Lord,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="780" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, out of hearing, gone? No sound, no word?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="781" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Alacke where are you? speake and if you heare:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="782" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Speake of all loues; I sound almost with feare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="783" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No, then I well perceiue you are not nye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="784" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Either death or you Ile finde immediately.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                        </tei-div>
                                </tei-div>
                        <tei-div type="act" n="3" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                    <tei-div type="scene" n="1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                        <tei-head rend="italic center" data-origname="head" data-origatts="rend">Actus Tertius.</tei-head>
                                        <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 3, Scene 1]</tei-head>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter the Clownes.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="785" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Are we all met?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="786" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Pat, pat, and here's a maruailous conuenient 
                                    <tei-lb n="787" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>place for our rehearsall. This greene plot shall be our
                                    <tei-lb n="788" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>stage, this hauthorne brake our tyring house, and we will 
                                    <tei-lb n="789" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>do it in action, as we will do it before the Duke.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="790" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter quince</tei-hi>?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Peter.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="791" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">What saist thou, bully <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi>?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="792" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">There are things in this Comedy of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>and
                                    <tei-lb n="793" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>, that will neuer please. First, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> must draw a
                                    <tei-lb n="794" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sword to kill himselfe; which the Ladies cannot abide.
                                    <tei-lb n="795" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>How answere you that?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snout.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="796" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Berlaken, a parlous feare.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Star.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="797" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I beleeue we must leaue the killing out, when 
                                    <tei-lb n="798" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>all is done.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="799" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Not a whit, I haue a deuice to make all well. 
                                    <tei-lb n="800" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Write me a Prologue, and let the Prologue seeme to say, 
                                    <tei-lb n="801" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>we will do no harme with our swords, and that <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi>
                                    <tei-lb n="802" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>is not kill'd indeede: and for the more better assurance, 
                                    <tei-lb n="803" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>tell them, that I <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> am not <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, but <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi> the 
                                    <tei-lb n="804" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Weauer; this will put them out of feare.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="805" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well, we will haue such a Prologue, and it shall 
                                    <tei-lb n="806" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>be written in eight and sixe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="807" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No, make it two more, let it be written in eight 
                                    <tei-lb n="808" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>and eight.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snout.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="809" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Will not the Ladies be afear'd of the Lyon?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Star.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="810" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I feare it, I promise you.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="811" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Masters, you ought to consider with your selues, to
                                    <tei-lb n="812" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>bring in (God shield vs) a Lyon among Ladies, is a most 
                                    <tei-lb n="813" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>dreadfull thing. For there is not a more fearefull wilde 
                                    <tei-lb n="814" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>foule then your Lyon liuing: and wee ought to looke 
                                    <tei-lb n="815" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>to it.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snout.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="816" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Therefore another Prologue must tell he is not 
                                    <tei-lb n="817" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>a Lyon.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="818" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Nay, you must name his name, and halfe his face
                                    <tei-lb n="819" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>must be seene through the Lyons necke, and he himselfe 
                                    <tei-lb n="820" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>must speake through, saying thus, or to the same defect; 
                                    <tei-lb n="821" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Ladies, or faire Ladies, I would wish you, or I would 
                           <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">request</tei-fw> 
                           <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0172-0.jpg" n="152" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/> 
                           <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw> 
                           <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                    <tei-lb n="822" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>request you, or I would entreat you, not to feare, not to 
                                    <tei-lb n="823" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>tremble: my life for yours. If you thinke I come hither 
                                    <tei-lb n="824" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>as a Lyon, it were pitty of my life. No, I am no such 
                                    <tei-lb n="825" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>thing, I am a man as other men are; and there indeed let 
                                    <tei-lb n="826" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>him name his name, and tell him plainly hee is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Snug</tei-hi> the 
                                    <tei-lb n="827" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ioyner.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="828" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well, it shall be so; but there is two hard 
                                    <tei-lb n="829" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>things, that is, to bring the Moone‑light into a cham­
                                    <tei-lb n="830" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ber: for you know <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> meete by Moone‑
                                    <tei-lb n="831" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>light.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Sn.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="832" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Doth the Moone shine that night wee play our 
                                    <tei-lb n="833" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>play?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="834" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">A Calender, a Calender, looke in the Almanack, 
                                    <tei-lb n="835" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>finde out Moone‑shine, finde out Moone‑shine.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="836" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Yes, it doth shine that night.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="837" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Why then may you leaue a casement of the great 
                                    <tei-lb n="838" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>chamber window (where we play) open, and the Moone 
                                    <tei-lb n="839" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>may shine in at the casement.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="840" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I, or else one must come in with a bush of thorns 
                                    <tei-lb n="841" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>and a lanthorne, and say he comes to disfigure, or to pre­
                                    <tei-lb n="842" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sent the person of Moone‑shine. Then there is another 
                                    <tei-lb n="843" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>thing, we must haue a wall in the great Chamber; for <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pi­
                                    <tei-lb n="844" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ramus</tei-hi> and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> (saies the story<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">)</tei-hi> did talke through the 
                                    <tei-lb n="845" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>chinke of a wall.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Sn.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="846" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You can neuer bring in a wall. What say you
                                <tei-lb n="847" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi>?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="848" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Some man or other must present wall, and let 
                                    <tei-lb n="849" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>him haue some Plaster, or some Lome, or some rough 
                                    <tei-lb n="850" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>cast about him, to signifie wall; or let him hold his fin­
                                    <tei-lb n="851" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>gers thus; and through that cranny, shall <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> and 
                                    <tei-lb n="852" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Thisby whisper.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="853" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">If that may be, then all is well. Come, sit 
                                    <tei-lb n="854" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>downe euery mothers sonne, and rehearse your parts. 
                                    <tei-lb n="855" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, you begin; when you haue spoken your speech,
                                    <tei-lb n="856" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>enter into that Brake, and so euery one according to his
                                    <tei-lb n="857" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>cue.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Robin.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="858" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What hempen home‑spuns haue we swagge­<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ring here,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="859" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So neere the Cradle of the Faierie Queene?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="860" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, a Play toward? Ile be an auditor,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="861" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">An Actor too perhaps, if I see cause.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="862" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Speake <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus:</tei-hi> <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> stand forth.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="863" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>, the flowers of odious sauors sweete.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="864" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Odours, odours.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="865" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Odours sauors sweete,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="866" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So hath thy breath, my dearest <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> deare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="867" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But harke, a voyce: stay thou but here a while,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="868" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And by and by I will to thee appeare.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.Pir.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="869" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A stranger <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, then ere plaid here.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="870" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Must I speake now?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pet.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="871" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I marry must you. For you must vnderstand he
                                    <tei-lb n="872" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>goes but to see a noyse that he heard, and is to come a­
                                    <tei-lb n="873" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>gaine.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="874" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Most radiant <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, most Lilly white of hue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="875" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of colour like the red rose on triumphant bryer,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="876" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Most brisky Iuuenall, and eke most louely Iew,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="877" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As true as truest horse, that yet would neuer tyre,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="878" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile meete thee <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, at <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ninnies</tei-hi> toombe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pet.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="879" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ninus</tei-hi> toombe man: why, you must not speake 
                                    <tei-lb n="880" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>that yet; that you answere to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>: you speake all 
                                    <tei-lb n="881" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>your part at once, cues and all. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> enter, your cue is
                                    <tei-lb n="882" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>past; it is neuer tyre.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="883" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O, as true as truest horse, that yet would neuer <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tyre:</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="884" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If I were faire, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> I were onely thine.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pet.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="885" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">O monstrous. O strange. We are hanted; pray
                                    <tei-lb n="886" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>masters, flye masters, helpe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">The Clownes all Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puk.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="887" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile follow you, Ile leade you about a Round,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="888" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Through bogge, through bush, through brake, through <tei-lb rend="turnunder" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-pc type="turnunder" data-origname="pc" data-origatts="type">(</tei-pc>bryer,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="889" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sometime a horse Ile be, sometime a hound:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="890" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A hogge, a headlesse beare, sometime a fire,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="891" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And neigh, and barke, and grunt, and rore, and burne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="892" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Like horse, hound, hog, beare, fire, at euery turne.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Piramus with the Asse head.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="893" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Why do they run away? This is a knauery of 
                                    <tei-lb n="894" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>them to make me afeard.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Snowt.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Sn.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="895" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">O <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottom</tei-hi>, thou art chang'd; What doe I see on 
                                    <tei-lb n="896" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>thee?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="897" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">What do you see? You see an Asse‑head of your 
                                    <tei-lb n="898" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>owne, do you?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Peter Quince.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pet.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="899" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Blesse thee <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi>, blesse thee; thou art transla­
                                    <tei-lb n="900" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ted.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="901" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I see their knauery; this is to make an asse of me, 
                                    <tei-lb n="902" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>to fright me if they could; but I will not stirre from
                                    <tei-lb n="903" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>this place, do what they can. I will walke vp and downe
                                    <tei-lb n="904" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>here, and I will sing that they shall heare I am not a­
                                    <tei-lb n="905" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>fraid.</tei-p>
                                <tei-l n="906" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Woosell cocke, so blacke of hew,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="907" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With Orenge‑tawny bill.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="908" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Throstle, with his note so true,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="909" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Wren and little quill.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tyta.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="910" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What Angell wakes me from my flowry bed?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="911" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Finch, the Sparrow, and the Larke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="912" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The plainsong Cuckow gray;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="913" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whose note full many a man doth marke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="914" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And dares not answere, nay.</tei-l>
                                <tei-p n="915" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">For indeede, who would set his wit to so foolish a bird?
                                    <tei-lb n="916" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Who would giue a bird the lye, though he cry Cuckow, 
                                    <tei-lb n="917" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>neuer so?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tyta.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="918" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I pray thee gentle mortall, sing againe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="919" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Mine eare is much enamored of thy note;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="920" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">On the first view to say, to sweare I loue thee.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="921" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So is mine eye enthralled to thy shape.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="922" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And thy faire vertues force (perforce) doth moue me.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="923" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Me‑thinkes mistresse, you should haue little
                                    <tei-lb n="924" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>reason for that: and yet to say the truth, reason and
                                    <tei-lb n="925" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>loue keepe little company together, now‑adayes. 
                                    <tei-lb n="926" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>The more the pittie, that some honest neighbours will
                                    <tei-lb n="927" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>not make them friends. Nay, I can gleeke vpon occa­
                                    <tei-lb n="928" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sion.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tyta.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="929" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou art as wise, as thou art beautifull.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="930" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Not so neither: but if I had wit enough to get 
                                    <tei-lb n="931" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>out of this wood, I haue enough to serue mine owne 
                                    <tei-lb n="932" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>turne.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tyta.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="933" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Out of this wood, do not desire to goe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="934" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou shalt remaine here, whether thou wilt or no.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="935" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am a spirit of no common rate:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="936" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Summer still doth tend vpon my state,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="937" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I doe loue thee; therefore goe with me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="938" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile giue thee Fairies to attend on thee;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="939" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And they shall fetch thee Iewels from the deepe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="940" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sing, while thou on pressed flowers dost sleepe:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="941" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I will purge thy mortall grossenesse so,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="942" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That thou shalt like an airie spirit go.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                                        <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pease‑blossome, Cobweb, Moth, Mustard‑
                                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>seede, and foure Fairies.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="943" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Ready; and I, and I, and I, Where shall we go?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">
                            <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-hi> Be</tei-fw>
                            <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0173-0.jpg" n="153" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                            <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="944" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Be kinde and curteous to this Gentleman,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="945" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hop in his walkes, and gambole in his eies,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="946" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Feede him with Apricocks, and Dewberries,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="947" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With purple Grapes, greene Figs, and Mulberries,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="948" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The honie‑bags steale from the humble Bees,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="949" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And for night‑tapers crop their waxen thighes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="950" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And light them at the fierie‑Glow‑wormes eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="951" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To haue my loue to bed, and to arise:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="952" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And plucke the wings from painted Butterflies,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="953" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To fan the Moone‑beames from his sleeping eies.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="954" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nod to him Elues, and doe him curtesies.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai.1" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">1. Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="955" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Haile mortall, haile.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai.2" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">2. Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="956" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Haile.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-fai.3" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">3. Fai.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="957" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Haile.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="958" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I cry your worships mercy hartily; I beseech 
                                    <tei-lb n="959" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>your worships name.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-cob" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Cob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="960" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cobweb</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="961" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I shall desire you of more acquaintance, good
                                    <tei-lb n="962" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Master <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cobweb</tei-hi>: if I cut my finger, I shall make bold 
                                    <tei-lb n="963" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>with you.
                                    <tei-lb n="964" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Your name honest Gentleman?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-pea" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Peas.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="965" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pease blossome.</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="966" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I pray you commend mee to mistresse <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Squash</tei-hi>,
                                <tei-lb n="967" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>your mother, and to master <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peascod</tei-hi> your father. Good 
                                    <tei-lb n="968" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>master <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pease‑blossome</tei-hi>, I shal desire of you more acquain­
                                    <tei-lb n="969" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>tance to. Your name I beseech you sir?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-mus" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Mus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="970" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Mustard‑seede</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-pea" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Peas.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="971" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pease‑blossome</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="972" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Good master <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Mustard seede</tei-hi>, I know your pati­
                                    <tei-lb n="973" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ence well: that same cowardly gyant‑like Oxe beefe 
                                    <tei-lb n="974" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>hath deuoured many a gentleman of your house. I pro­
                                    <tei-lb n="975" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>mise you, your kindred hath made my eyes water ere 
                                    <tei-lb n="976" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>now. I desire you more acquaintance, good Master 
                                    <tei-lb n="977" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Mustard‑seede</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="978" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come waite vpon him, lead him to my bower.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="979" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Moone me‑thinks, lookes with a watrie eie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="980" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And when she weepes, weepe euerie little flower,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="981" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lamenting some enforced chastitie.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="982" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tye vp my louers tongue, bring him silently.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                           </tei-div>
                                    <tei-div type="scene" n="2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                        <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 3, Scene 2]</tei-head> 
                                <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter King of Pharies, solus.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="983" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I wonder if <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Titania</tei-hi> be awak't;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="984" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then what it was that next came in her eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="985" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which she must dote on, in extremitie.</tei-l>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l n="986" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Here comes my messenger: how now mad spirit,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="987" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What night‑rule now about this gaunted groue?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
