                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="988" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Mistris with a monster is in loue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="989" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neere to her close and consecrated bower,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="990" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">While she was in her dull and sleeping hower,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="991" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A crew of patches, rude <tei-choice data-origname="choice">
                                    <tei-orig data-origname="orig">Mcehanicals</tei-orig>
                                    <tei-corr data-origname="corr">Mechanicals</tei-corr>
                                </tei-choice>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="992" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That worke for bread vpon <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> stals,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="993" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Were met together to rehearse a Play,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="994" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Intended for great <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi> nuptiall day:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="995" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The shallowest thick‑skin of that barren sort,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="996" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Who <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> presented, in their sport,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="997" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Forsooke his Scene, and entred in a brake,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="998" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I did him at this aduantage take,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="999" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">An Asses nole I fixed on his head.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1000" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Anon his <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> must be answered,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1001" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And forth my Mimmick comes: when they him spie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1002" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As Wilde‑geese, that the creeping Fowler eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1003" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or russed‑pated choughes, many in sort</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1004" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(Rising and cawing at the guns report)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1005" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Seuer themselues, and madly sweepe the skye:</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1006" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So at his sight, away his fellowes flye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1007" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And at our stampe, here ore and ore one fals;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1008" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He murther cries, and helpe from <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> cals.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1009" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Their sense thus weake, lost with their fears thus strong,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1010" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Made senselesse things begin to do them wrong.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1011" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For briars and thornes at their apparell snatch,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1012" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Some sleeues, some hats, from yeelders all things catch,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1013" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I led them on in this distracted feare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1014" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And left sweete <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> translated there:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1015" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When in that moment (so it came to passe)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1016" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n"> <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tytania</tei-hi> waked, and straightway lou'd an Asse.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1017" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This fals out better then I could deuise:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1018" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But hast thou yet lacht the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenians</tei-hi> eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1019" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With the loue iuyce, as I did bid thee doe?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1020" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I tooke him sleeping (that is finisht to)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1021" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> woman by his side,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1022" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That when he wak't, of force she must be eyde.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Demetrius and Hermia.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1023" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stand close, this is the same <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1024" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This is the woman, but not this the man.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1025" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O why rebuke you him that loues you so?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1026" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lay breath so bitter on your bitter foe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1027" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now I but chide, but I should vse thee worse.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1028" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For thou (I feare) hast giuen me cause to curse,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1029" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If thou hast slaine <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> in his sleepe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1030" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Being ore shooes in bloud, plunge in the deepe, and kill 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>me too:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1031" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Sunne was not so true vnto the day,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1032" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As he to me. Would he haue stollen away,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1033" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From sleeping <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>? Ile beleeue as soone</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1034" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This whole earth may be bord, and that the Moone</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1035" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">May through the Center creepe, and so displease</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1036" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Her brothers noonetide, with th'<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Antipodes</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1037" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It cannot be but thou hast murdred him,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1038" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So should a mutrherer looke, so dead, so grim.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1039" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So should the murderer looke, and so should I,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1040" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pierst through the heart with your stearne cruelty:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1041" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yet you the murderer looks as bright as cleare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1042" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As yonder <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Venus</tei-hi> in her glimmering spheare.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1043" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What's this to my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>? where is he<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">?</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1044" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ah good <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>, wilt thou giue him me?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1045" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I'de rather giue his carkasse to my hounds.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1046" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Out dog, out cur, thou driu'st me past the bounds</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1047" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of maidens patience. Hast thou slaine him then?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1048" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Henceforth be neuer numbred among men.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1049" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Oh, once tell true, euen for my sake,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1050" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Durst thou a lookt vpon him, being awake?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1051" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And hast thou kill'd him sleeping? O braue tutch:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1052" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Could not a worme, an Adder do so much?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1053" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">An Adder did it: for with doubler tongue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1054" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then thine (thou serpent) neuer Adder stung.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1055" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You spend your passion on a <tei-choice data-origname="choice">
                                    <tei-orig data-origname="orig">mispri'sd</tei-orig>
                                    <tei-corr data-origname="corr">mispris'd</tei-corr>
                                </tei-choice> mood,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1056" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am not guiltie of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysanders</tei-hi> blood:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1057" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nor is he dead for ought that I can tell.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1058" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I pray thee tell me then that he is well.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1059" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And if I could, what should I get therefore?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1060" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A priuiledge, neuer to see me more;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1061" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And from thy hated presence part I: see me no more</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1062" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whether he be dead or no.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1063" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There is no following her in this fierce vaine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1064" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Here therefore for a while I will remaine.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1065" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So sorrowes heauinesse doth heauier grow:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1066" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For debt that bankrout slip doth sorrow owe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1067" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which now in some slight measure it will pay,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">If</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0174-0.jpg" n="154" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1068" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If for his tender here I make some stay.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                           <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Lie downe.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1069" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What hast thou done? Thou hast mistaken quite</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1070" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And laid the loue iuyce on some true loues sight:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1071" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of thy misprision, must perforce ensue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1072" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Some true loue turn'd, and not a false turn'd true.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1073" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then fate ore‑rules, that one man holding troth,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1074" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A million faile, confounding oath on oath.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1075" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">About the wood, goe swifter then the winde,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1076" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi> of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> looke thou finde.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1077" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">All fancy sicke she is, and pale of cheere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1078" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With sighes of loue, that costs the fresh bloud deare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1079" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By some illusion see thou bring her heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1080" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile charme his eyes against she doth appeare.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Robin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1081" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I go, I go, looke how I goe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1082" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Swifter then arrow from the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tartars</tei-hi> bowe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1083" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Flower of this purple die,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1084" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hit with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cupids</tei-hi> archery,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1085" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sinke in apple of his eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1086" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When his loue he doth espie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1087" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let her shine as gloriously</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1088" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Venus</tei-hi> of the sky.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1089" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou wak'st if she be by,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1090" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Beg of her for remedy.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1091" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Captaine of our Fairy band,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1092" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi> is heere at hand,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1093" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the youth, mistooke by me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1094" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pleading for a Louers fee.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1095" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Shall we their fond Pageant see?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1096" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lord, what fooles these mortals be!</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1097" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stand aside: the noyse they make,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1098" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Will cause <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi> to awake.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1099" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then will two at once wooe one,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1100" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That must needs be sport alone:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1101" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And those things doe best please me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1102" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That befall preposterously.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Lysander and
                                Helena.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1103" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why should you think y<tei-hi rend="superscript" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">t</tei-hi> I should wooe in scorn?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1104" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Scorne and derision neuer comes in teares:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1105" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Looke when I vow I weepe; and vowes so borne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1106" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In their natiuity all truth appeares.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1107" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How can these things in me, seeme scorne to you?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1108" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Bearing the badge of faith to proue them true.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1109" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You doe aduance your cunning more & more,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1110" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When truth kils truth, O diuelish holy fray!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1111" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These vowes are <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermias</tei-hi>. Will you giue her ore?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1112" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Weigh oath with oath, and you will nothing weigh.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1113" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Your vowes to her, and me, (put in two scales<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">)</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1114" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Will euen weigh, and both as light as tales.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1115" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I had no iudgement, when to her I swore.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1116" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nor none in my minde, now you giue her ore.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1117" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi> loues her, and he loues not you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Awa.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1118" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O Helen, goddesse, nimph, perfect, diuine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1119" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To what my, loue, shall I compare thine eyne!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1120" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Christall is muddy, O how ripe in show,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1121" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy lips, those kissing cherries, tempting grow!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1122" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That pure congealed white, high <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Taurus</tei-hi> snow,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1123" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fan'd with the Easterne winde, turnes to a crow,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1124" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou holdst vp thy hand. O let me kisse</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1125" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This Princesse of pure white, this seale of blisse.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hell.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1126" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O spight! O hell! I see you are all bent</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1127" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To set against me, for your merriment:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1128" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If you were ciuill, and knew curtesie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1129" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You would not doe me thus much iniury.</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1130" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Can you not hate me, as I know you doe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1131" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But you must ioyne in soules to mocke me to?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1132" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If you are men, as men you are in show,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1133" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You would not vse a gentle Lady so;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1134" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To vow, and sweare, and superpraise my parts,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1135" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I am sure you hate me with your hearts.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1136" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You both are Riuals, and loue <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1137" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now both Riuals to mocke <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1138" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A trim exploit, a manly enterprize,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1139" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To coniure teares vp in a poore maids eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1140" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With your derision; none of noble sort,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1141" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Would so offend a Virgin, and extort</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1142" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A poore soules patience, all to make you sport.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lysa.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1143" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You are vnkind <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>; be not so,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1144" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For you loue <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>; this you know I know;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1145" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And here with all good will, with all my heart,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1146" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermias</tei-hi> loue I yeeld you vp my part;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1147" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And yours of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>, to me bequeath,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1148" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whom I do loue, and will do to my death.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1149" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neuer did mockers wast more idle breth.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1150" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, keep thy <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, I will none:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1151" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If ere I lou'd her, all that loue is gone.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1152" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My heart to her, but as guest‑wise soiourn'd,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1153" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helen</tei-hi> it is home return'd,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1154" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There to remaine.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1155" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It is not so.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">De.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1156" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Disparage not the faith thou dost not know,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1157" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lest to thy perill thou abide it deare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1158" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Looke where thy Loue comes, yonder is thy deare.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Hermia.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1159" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Dark night, that from the eye his function takes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1160" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The eare more quicke of apprehension makes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1161" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wherein it doth impaire the seeing sense,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1162" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It paies the hearing double recompence.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1163" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou art not by mine eye, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> found,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1164" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Mine eare (I thanke it) brought me to that sound.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1165" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But why vnkindly didst thou leaue me so?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lysan.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1166" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why should hee stay whom Loue doth presse 
                                    <tei-lb rend="turnover" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-pc rend="turnover" data-origname="pc" data-origatts="rend">(</tei-pc>to go?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1167" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What loue could presse <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi> from my side?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1168" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysanders</tei-hi> loue (that would not let him bide)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1169" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>; who more engilds the night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1170" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then all yon fierie oes, and eies of light.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1171" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why seek'st thou me? Could not this make thee know,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1172" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The hate I bare thee, made me leaue thee so?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1173" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You speake not as you thinke; it cannot be.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1174" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Loe, she is one of this confederacy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1175" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now I perceiue they haue conioyn'd all three,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1176" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To fashion this false sport in spight of me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1177" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Iniurous Hermia, most vngratefull maid,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1178" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Haue you conspir'd, haue you with these contriu'd</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1179" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To baite me, with this foule derision?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1180" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is all the counsell that we two haue shar'd,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1181" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The sisters vowes, the houres that we haue spent,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1182" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When wee haue chid the hasty footed time,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1183" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For parting vs; O, is all forgot?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1184" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">All schooledaies friendship, child‑hood innocence?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1185" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We Hermia, like two Artificiall gods,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1186" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Haue with our needles, created both one flower,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1187" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Both on one sampler, sitting on one cushion,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1188" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Both warbling of one song, both in one key;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1189" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As if our hands, our sides, voices, and mindes</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1190" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Had beene incorporate. So we grew together,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1191" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Like to a double cherry, seeming parted,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1192" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But yet a vnion in partition,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">Two</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0175-0.jpg" n="155" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1193" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Two louely berries molded on one stem,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1194" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So with two seeming bodies, but one heart,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1195" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Two of the first life coats in Heraldry,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1196" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Due but to one and crowned with one crest.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1197" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And will you rent our ancient loue asunder,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1198" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To ioyne with men in scorning your poore friend?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1199" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It is not friendly, 'tis not maidenly.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1200" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Our sexe as well as I, may chide you for it,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1201" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Though I alone doe feele the iniurie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1202" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am amazed at your passionate words,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1203" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I scorne you not; It seemes that you scorne me.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1204" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Haue you not set <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, as in scorne</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1205" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To follow me, and praise my eies and face?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1206" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And made your other loue, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1207" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(Who euen but now did spurne me with his foote)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1208" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To call me goddesse, nimph, diuine, and rare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1209" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Precious, celestiall? Wherefore speakes he this</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1210" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To her he hates? And wherefore doth <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1211" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Denie your loue (so rich within his soule)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1212" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And tender me (forsooth<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">)</tei-hi> affection,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1213" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But by your setting on, by your consent?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1214" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What though I be not so in grace as you,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1215" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So hung vpon with loue, so fortunate?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1216" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(But miserable most, to loue vnlou'd)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1217" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This you should pittie, rather then despise.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1218" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I vnderstand not what you meane by this.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1219" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, doe, perseuer, counterfeit sad lookes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1220" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Make mouthes vpon me when I turne my backe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1221" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Winke each at other, hold the sweete iest vp:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1222" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This sport well carried, shall be chronicled.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1223" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If you haue any pittie, grace, or manners,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1224" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You would not make me such an argument:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1225" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But fare ye well, 'tis partly mine owne fault,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1226" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which death or absence soone shall remedie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1227" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stay gentle <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>, heare my excuse,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1228" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My loue, my life, my soule, faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1229" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O excellent!</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1230" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sweete, do not scorne her so.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1231" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If she cannot entreate, I can compell.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1232" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou canst compell, no more then she entreate.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1233" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy threats haue no more strength then her weak praise.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1234" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helen</tei-hi>, I loue thee, by my life I doe;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1235" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I sweare by that which I will lose for thee,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1236" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To proue him false, that saies I loue thee not.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1237" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I say, I loue thee more then he can do.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1238" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If thou say so, with‑draw and proue it too.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1239" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Quick, come.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1240" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, whereto tends all this?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1241" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Away, you <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ethiope</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1242" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No, no, Sir, seeme to breake loose;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1243" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Take on as you would follow,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1244" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But yet come not: you are a tame man, go.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1245" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hang off thou cat, thou bur; vile thing let loose,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1246" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or I will shake thee from me like a serpent.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1247" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why are you growne so rude?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1248" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What change is this sweete Loue?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1249" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy loue? out tawny <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Tartar</tei-hi>, out;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1250" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Out loathed medicine; O hated poison hence.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1251" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Do you not iest?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1252" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yes sooth, and so do you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1253" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>: I will keepe my word with thee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1254" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I would I had your bond: for I perceiue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1255" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A weake bond holds you; Ile not trust your word.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1256" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, should I hurt her, strike her, kill her dead?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1257" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Although I hate her, Ile not harme her so.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1258" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, can you do me greater harme then hate?</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1259" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hate me, wherefore? O me, what newes my Loue?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1260" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Am not I <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>? Are not you <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander?</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1261" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am as faire now, as I was ere while.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1262" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Since night you lou'd me: yet since night you left me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1263" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why then you left me (O the gods forbid</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1264" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In earnest, shall I say?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1265" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, by my life;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1266" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And neuer did desire to see thee more.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1267" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therefore be out of hope, of question, of doubt;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1268" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Be certaine, nothing truer: 'tis no iest,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1269" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I doe hate thee, and loue <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1270" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O me, you iugler, you canker blossome,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1271" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You theefe of loue; What, haue you come by night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1272" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And stolne my loues heart from him?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1273" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fine yfaith:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1274" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Haue you no modesty, no maiden shame,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1275" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No touch of bashfulnesse? What, will you teare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1276" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Impatient answers from my gentle tongue?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1277" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fie, fie, you counterfeit, you puppet, you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1278" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Puppet? why so? I, that way goes the game.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1279" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now I perceiue that she hath made compare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1280" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Betweene our statures, she hath vrg'd her height,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1281" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And with her personage, her tall personage,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1282" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Her height (forsooth) she hath preuail'd with him.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1283" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And are you growne so high in his esteeme,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1284" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Because I am so dwarfish, and so low?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1285" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How low am I, thou painted May‑pole? Speake,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1286" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How low am I? I am not yet so low,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1287" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But that my nailes can reach vnto thine eyes.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1288" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I pray you though you mocke me, gentlemen,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1289" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let her not hurt me; I was neuer curst:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1290" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I haue no gift at all in shrewishnesse;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1291" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am a right maide for my cowardize;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1292" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let her not strike me: you perhaps may thinke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1293" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Because she is something lower then my selfe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1294" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I can match her.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1295" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lower? harke againe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1296" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Good <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>, do not be so bitter with me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1297" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I euermore did loue you <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1298" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Did euer keepe your counsels, neuer wronged you,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1299" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Saue that in loue vnto <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1300" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I told him of your stealth vnto this wood.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1301" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He followed you, for loue I followed him,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1302" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But he hath chid me hence, and threatned me</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1303" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To strike me, spurne me, nay to kill me too;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1304" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now, so you will let me quiet go,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1305" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> will I beare my folly backe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1306" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And follow you no further. Let me go.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1307" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You see how simple, and how fond I am.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1308" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why get you gone: who ist that hinders you?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1309" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A foolish heart, that I leaue here behinde.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1310" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What, with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1311" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1312" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Be not afraid, she shall not harme thee <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1313" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No sir, she shall not, though you take her part.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1314" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O when she's angry, she is keene and shrewd,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1315" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">She was a vixen when she went to schoole,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1316" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And though she be but little, she is fierce.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1317" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Little againe? Nothing but low and little?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1318" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why will you suffer her to flout me thus?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1319" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let me come to her.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1320" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Get you gone you dwarfe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1321" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">minimus</tei-hi>, of hindring knot‑grasse made,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1322" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You bead, you acorne.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1323" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You are too officious,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1324" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In her behalfe that scornes your seruices.</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">Let</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0176-0.jpg" n="156" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1325" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let her alone, speake not of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1326" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Take not her part. For if thou dost intend</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1327" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neuer so little shew of loue to her,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1328" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou shalt abide it.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1329" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now she holds me not,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1330" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now follow if thou dar'st, to try whose right,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1331" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of thine or mine is most in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1332" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Follow? Nay, Ile goe with thee cheeke by 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>iowle.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Lysander and Demetrius.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1333" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You Mistris, all this coyle is long of you.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1334" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nay, goe not backe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1335" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I will not trust you I,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1336" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nor longer stay in your curst companie.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1337" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Your hands then mine, are quicker for a fray,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1338" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My legs are longer though to runne away.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Oberon and
                                Pucke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1339" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This is thy negligence, still thou mistak'st,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1340" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or else committ'st thy knaueries willingly.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1341" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Beleeue me, King of shadowes, I mistooke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1342" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Did not you tell me, I should know the man,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1343" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> garments he hath on?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1344" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And so farre blamelesse proues my enterprize,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1345" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I haue nointed an Athenians eies,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1346" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And so farre am I glad, it so did sort,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1347" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As this their iangling I esteeme a sport.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
