                                <tei-l n="1348" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou seest these Louers seeke a place to fight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1349" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hie therefore <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin</tei-hi>, ouercast the night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1350" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The starrie Welkin couer thou anon,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1351" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With drooping fogge as blacke as <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Acheron</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1352" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And lead these testie Riuals so astray,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1353" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As one come not within anothers way.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1354" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Like to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, sometime frame thy tongue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1355" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then stirre <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi> vp with bitter wrong;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1356" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sometime raile thou like <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1357" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And from each other looke thou leade them thus,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1358" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Till ore their browes, death‑counterfeiting, sleepe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1359" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With leaden legs, and Battie‑wings doth creepe:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1360" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then crush this hearbe into <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysanders</tei-hi> eie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1361" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whose liquor hath this vertuous propertie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1362" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To take from thence all error, with his might,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1363" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And make his eie‑bals role with wonted sight.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1364" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When they next wake, all this derision</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1365" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Shall seeme a dreame, and fruitlesse vision,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1366" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And backe to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> shall the Louers wend</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1367" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With league, whose date till death shall neuer end.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1368" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whiles I in this affaire do thee imply,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1369" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile to my Queene, and beg her <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Indian</tei-hi> Boy;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1370" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And then I will her charmed eie release</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1371" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From monsters view, and all things shall be peace.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1372" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Fairie Lord, this must be done with haste,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1373" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For night‑swift Dragons cut the Clouds full fast,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1374" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And yonder shines <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Auroras</tei-hi> harbinger;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1375" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">At whose approach Ghosts wandring here and there,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1376" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Troope home to Church‑yards; damned spirits all,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1377" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That in crosse‑waies and flouds haue buriall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1378" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Alreadie to their wormie beds are gone;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1379" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For feare least day should looke their shames vpon,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1380" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">They wilfully themselues dxile from light,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1381" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And must for aye consort with blacke browd night.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1382" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But we are spirits of another sort:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1383" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, with the mornings loue haue oft made sport,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1384" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And like a Forrester, the groues may tread,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1385" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Euen till the Easterne gate all fierie red,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1386" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Opening on <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Neptune</tei-hi>, with faire blessed beames,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1387" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Turnes into yellow gold, his salt greene streames.</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1388" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But notwithstanding haste, make no delay:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1389" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We may effect this businesse, yet ere day.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1390" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Vp and downe, vp and downe, I will leade 
                                    <tei-lb n="1391" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>them vp and downe: I am fear'd in field and towne.
                                    <tei-lb n="1392" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Goblin</tei-hi>, lead them vp and downe: here comes one.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Lysander.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1393" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where art thou, proud <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1394" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Speake thou now.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1395" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Here villaine, drawne & readie. Where art thou?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1396" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I will be with thee straight.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1397" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Follow me then to plainer ground.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Demetrius.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1398" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, speake againe;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1399" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou runaway, thou coward, art thou fled?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1400" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Speake in some bush: Where dost thou hide thy head?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1401" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou coward, art thou bragging to the stars,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1402" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Telling the bushes that thou look'st for wars,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1403" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And wilt not come? Come recreant, come thou childe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1404" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile whip thee with a rod. He is defil'd</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1405" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That drawes a sword on thee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1406" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yea, art thou there?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ro.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1407" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Follow my voice, we'l try no manhood here.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1408" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He goes before me, and still dares me on,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1409" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I come where he cals, then he's gone.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1410" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The villaine is much lighter heel'd then I:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1411" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I followed fast, but faster he did flye;</tei-l>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">shifting places.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l n="1412" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That fallen am I in darke vneuen way,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1413" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And here wil rest me. Come thou gentle day:</tei-l>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">lye down.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l n="1414" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For if but once thou shew me thy gray light,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1415" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile finde <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>, and reuenge this spight.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Robin and Demetrius.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1416" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ho, ho, ho; coward, why com'st thou not?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1417" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Abide me, if thou dar'st. For well I wot,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1418" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou runst before me, shifting euery place,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1419" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And dar'st not stand, nor looke me in the face.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1420" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where art thou?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1421" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come hither, I am here.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1422" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Nay then thou mock'st me; thou shalt buy this
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>deere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1423" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If euer I thy face by day‑light see.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1424" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now goe thy way: faintnesse constraineth me,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1425" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To measure out my length on this cold bed,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1426" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By daies approach looke to be visited.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Helena.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1427" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O weary night, O long and tedious night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1428" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Abate thy houres, shine comforts from the East,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1429" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I may backe to Athens by day‑light,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1430" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From these that my poore companie detest;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1431" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sleepe that sometime shuts vp sorrowes eie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1432" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Steale me a while from mine owne companie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Sleepe.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1433" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yet but three? Come one more,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1434" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Two of both kindes makes vp foure.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1435" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Here she comes, curst and sad,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1436" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cupid</tei-hi> is a knauish lad,</tei-l>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Hermia.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l n="1437" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thus to make poore females mad.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1438" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neuer so wearie, neuer so in woe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1439" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Bedabbled with the dew, and torne with briars,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1440" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I can no further crawle, no further goe;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1441" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My legs can keepe no pace with my desires.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1442" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Here will I rest me till the breake of day,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1443" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Heauens shield <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, if they meane a fray.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1444" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">On the ground sleepe sound,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1445" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ile apply your eie gentle louer, remedy.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1446" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou wak'st, thou tak'st</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1447" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">True delight in the sight of thy former Ladies eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">And</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0177-0.jpg" n="157" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1448" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the Country Prouerb knowne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1449" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That euery man should take his owne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1450" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In your waking shall be showne.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1451" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Iacke</tei-hi> shall haue <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Iill</tei-hi>, nought shall goe ill,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1452" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The man shall haue his Mare againe, and all shall bee
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>well.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">They sleepe all the Act.</tei-stage>
                        </tei-div>
                        </tei-div>
                            <tei-div type="act" n="4" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                <tei-div type="scene" n="1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                    <tei-head rend="italic center" data-origname="head" data-origatts="rend">Actus Quartus.</tei-head>
                                    <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 4, Scene 1]</tei-head> 
                            <tei-stage rend="italic" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Queene of Fairies, and Clowne, and Fairies, and the 
                                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>King behinde them.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1453" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come, sit thee downe vpon this flowry bed,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1454" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">While I thy amiable cheekes doe coy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1455" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And sticke muske roses in thy sleeke smoothe head,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1456" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And kisse thy faire large eares, my gentle ioy.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clow.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1457" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Where's <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pease blossome?</tei-hi>
                            </tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-pea" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Peas.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1458" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Ready.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clow.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1459" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Scratch my head, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pease‑blossome</tei-hi>. Wher's Moun­
                                    <tei-lb n="1460" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sieuer <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cobweb</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-cob" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Cob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1461" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Ready.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clowne.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1462" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Mounsieur <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cobweb</tei-hi>, good Mounsier get your
                                    <tei-lb n="1463" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>weapons in your hand, & kill me a red hipt humble‑Bee, 
                                    <tei-lb n="1464" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>on the top of a thistle; and good Mounsieur bring mee 
                                    <tei-lb n="1465" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>the hony bag. Doe not fret your selfe too much in the 
                                    <tei-lb n="1466" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>action, Mounsieur; and good Mounsieur haue a care the 
                                    <tei-lb n="1467" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>hony bag breake not, I would be loth to haue yo<tei-c rend="invertedType" data-origname="c" data-origatts="rend">u</tei-c> ouer‑
                                    <tei-lb n="1468" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>flowne with a hony‑bag signiour. Where's Mounsieur 
                                    <tei-lb n="1469" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Mustardseed</tei-hi>?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-mus" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Mus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1470" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Ready.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clo.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1471" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Giue me your neafe, Mounsieur <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Mustardseed</tei-hi>.
                                <tei-lb n="1472" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Pray you leaue your courtesie good Mounsieur.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-mus" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Mus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1473" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">What's your will?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clo.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1474" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Nothing good Mounsieur, but to help Caualery 
                                    <tei-lb n="1475" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cobweb</tei-hi> to scratch. I must to the Barbers Mounsieur, for 
                                    <tei-lb n="1476" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>me‑thinkes I am maruellous hairy about the face. And I 
                                    <tei-lb n="1477" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>am such a tender asse, if my haire do but tickle me, I must 
                                    <tei-lb n="1478" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>scratch.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1479" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">What, wilt thou heare some musicke, my sweet <tei-lb n="1480" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>loue.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clow.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1481" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I haue a reasonable good eare in musicke. Let 
                                    <tei-lb n="1482" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>vs haue the tongs and the bones.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Musicke Tongs, Rurall Musicke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1483" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or say sweete Loue, what thou desirest to eat.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clowne.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1484" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Truly a pecke of Prouender; I could munch 
                                    <tei-lb n="1485" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>your good dry Oates. Me‑thinkes I haue a great desire 
                                    <tei-lb n="1486" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>to a bottle of hay: good hay, sweete hay hath no fel­
                                    <tei-lb n="1487" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>low.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1488" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I haue a venturous Fairy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1489" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That shall seeke the Squirrels hoard,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1490" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And fetch thee new Nuts.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clown.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1491" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I had rather haue a handfull or two of dried 
                                    <tei-lb n="1492" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>pease. But I pray you let none of your people stirre me, I 
                                    <tei-lb n="1493" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>haue an exposition of sleepe come vpon me.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tyta.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1494" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sleepe thou, and I will winde thee in my arms,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1495" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Fairies be gone, and be alwaies away.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1496" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So doth the woodbine, the sweet Honisuckle,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1497" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Gently entwist; the female Iuy so</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1498" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Enrings the barky fingers of the Elme.</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1499" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O how I loue thee! how I dote on thee<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">!</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Robin goodfellow and Oberon.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1500" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Welcome good <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin</tei-hi>:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1501" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Seest thou this sweet sight?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1502" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Her dotage now I doe begin to pitty.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1503" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For meeting her of late behinde the wood,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1504" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Seeking sweet sauors for this hatefull foole,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1505" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I did vpbraid her, and fall out with her.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1506" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For she his hairy temples then had rounded,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1507" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With coronet of fresh and fragrant flowers.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1508" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And that same dew which somtime on the buds,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1509" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Was wont to swell like round and orient pearles;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1510" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Stood now within the pretty flouriets eyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1511" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Like teares that did their owne disgrace bewaile.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1512" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I had at my pleasure taunted her,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1513" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And she in milde termes beg'd my patience,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1514" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I then did aske of her, her changeling childe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1515" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which straight she gaue me, and her Fairy sent</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1516" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To beare him to my Bower in Fairy Land.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1517" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now I haue the Boy, I will vndoe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1518" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This hatefull imperfection of her eyes.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1519" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And gentle <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pucke</tei-hi>, take this transformed scalpe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1520" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From off the head of this <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> swaine;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1521" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That he awaking when the other doe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1522" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">May all to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi> backe againe repaire,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1523" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And thinke no more of this nights accidents,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1524" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But as the fierce vexation of a dreame.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1525" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But first I will release the Fairy Queene.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic centre" n="1526" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Be thou as thou wast wont to be;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic centre" n="1527" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">See as thou wast wont to see.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic centre" n="1528" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Dians bud, or Cupids flower,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic centre" n="1529" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Hath such force and blessed power.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1530" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Titania</tei-hi> wake you my sweet Queene.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1531" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Oberon</tei-hi>, what visions haue I seene!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1532" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Me‑thought I was enamoured of an Asse.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1533" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There lies your loue.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1534" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How came these things to passe?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1535" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Oh, how mine eyes doth loath this visage now!</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1536" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Silence a while. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin</tei-hi> take off his head:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1537" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Titania</tei-hi>, musick call, and strike more dead</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1538" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then common sleepe; of all these, fine the sense.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1539" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Musicke, ho musicke, such as charmeth sleepe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Musick
                                still.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1540" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When thou wak'st, with thine owne fooles eies 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>peepe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1541" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sound musick; come my Queen, take hands with <tei-lb rend="turnover" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-pc rend="turnover" data-origname="pc" data-origatts="rend">(</tei-pc>me</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1542" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And rocke the ground whereon these sleepers be.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1543" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now thou and I are new in amity,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1544" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And will to morrow midnight, solemnly</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1545" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Dance in Duke <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi> house triumphantly,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1546" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And blesse it to all faire posterity.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1547" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There shall the paires of faithfull Louers be</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1548" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wedded, with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi>, all in iollity.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Rob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1549" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Faire King attend, and marke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1550" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I doe heare the morning Larke.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1551" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then my Queene in silence sad,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1552" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Trip we after the nights shade;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1553" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We the Globe can compasse soone,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1554" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Swifter then the wandring Moone.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1555" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come my Lord, and in our flight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1556" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tell me how it came this night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1557" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I sleeping heere was found,</tei-l>
                                <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Sleepers Lye still.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-fw type="sig" place="footCentre" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">O</tei-fw>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">With</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0178-0.jpg" n="158" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1558" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With these mortals on the ground.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exeunt.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Winde Hornes.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Theseus, Egeus,
                                Hippolita and all his traine.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1559" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Goe one of you, finde out the Forrester,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1560" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For now our obseruation is perform'd;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1561" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And since we haue the vaward of the day,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1562" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Loue shall heare the musicke of my hounds.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1563" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vncouple in the Westerne valley, let them goe;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1564" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Dispatch I say, and finde the Forrester.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1565" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We will faire Queene, vp to the Mountaines top.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1566" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And marke the musicall confusion</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1567" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of hounds and eccho in coniunction.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1568" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I was with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hercules</tei-hi> and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Cadmus</tei-hi> once,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1569" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When in a wood of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Creete</tei-hi> they bayed the Beare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1570" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With hounds of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Sparta</tei-hi>; neuer did I heare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1571" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Such gallant chiding. For besides the groues,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1572" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The skies, the fountaines, euery region neere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1573" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Seeme all one mutuall cry. I neuer heard</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1574" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So musicall a discord, such sweet thunder.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1575" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My hounds are bred out of the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Spartan</tei-hi> kinde,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1576" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So flew'd, so sanded, and their heads are hung</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1577" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With eares that sweepe away the morning dew,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1578" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Crooke kneed, and dew‑lapt, like <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thessalian</tei-hi> Buls,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1579" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Slow in pursuit, but match'd in mouth like bels,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1580" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Each vnder each. A cry more tuneable</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1581" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Was neuer hallowed to, nor cheer'd with horne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1582" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Creete</tei-hi>, in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Sparta</tei-hi>, nor in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thessaly</tei-hi>;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1583" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Iudge when you heare. B<tei-c rend="invertedType" data-origname="c" data-origatts="rend">u</tei-c>t soft, what nimphs are these?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Egeus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1584" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Lord, this is my daughter heere asleepe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1585" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And this <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lysander</tei-hi>, this <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi> is,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1586" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>, olde <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Nedars Helena</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1587" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I wonder of this being heere together.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1588" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No doubt they rose vp early, to obserue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1589" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The right of May; and hearing our intent,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1590" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Came heere in grace of our solemnity.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1591" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But speake <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Egeus</tei-hi>, is not this the day</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1592" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> should giue answer of her choice?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Egeus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1593" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It is, my Lord.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1594" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Goe bid the hunts‑men wake them with their <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>hornes.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Hornes and they wake.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Shout within, they all start vp.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1595" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Good morrow friends: Saint <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Valentine</tei-hi> is past,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1596" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Begin these wood birds but to couple now?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1597" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pardon my Lord.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1598" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I pray you all stand vp.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1599" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I know you two are Riuall enemies.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1600" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How comes this gentle concord in the world,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1601" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That hatred <tei-choice data-origname="choice">
                                    <tei-orig data-origname="orig">is is</tei-orig>
                                    <tei-corr data-origname="corr">is</tei-corr>
                                </tei-choice> so farre from iealousie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1602" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To sleepe by hate, and feare no enmity.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1603" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Lord, I shall reply amazedly,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1604" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Halfe sleepe, halfe waking. But as yet, I sweare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1605" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I cannot truly say how I came heere.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1606" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But as I thinke (for truly would I speake)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1607" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now I doe bethinke me, so it is;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1608" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I came with <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> hither. Our intent</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1609" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Was to be gone from <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi>, where we might be</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1610" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Without the perill of the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi> Law.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ege.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1611" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Enough, enough, my Lord: you haue enough;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1612" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I beg the Law, the Law, vpon his head:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1613" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">They would have stolne away, they would <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1614" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thereby to haue defeated you and me:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1615" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You of your wife, and me of my consent;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1616" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of my consent, that she should be your wife.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1617" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Lord, faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helen</tei-hi> told me of their stealth,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1618" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of this their purpose hither, to this wood,</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1619" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I in furie hither followed them;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1620" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>, in fancy followed me.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1621" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But my good Lord, I wot not by what power,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1622" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">(But by some power it is) my loue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1623" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi> (melted as the snow)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1624" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Seems to me now as the remembrance of an idle gaude,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1625" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which in my childehood I did doat vpon:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1626" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And all the faith, the vertue of my heart,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1627" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The obiect and the pleasure of mine eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1628" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is onely <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helena</tei-hi>. To her, my Lord,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1629" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Was I betroth'd, ere I see <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hermia</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1630" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But like a sickenesse did I loath this food,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1631" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But as in health, come to my naturall taste,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1632" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now doe I wish it, loue it, long for it,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1633" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And will for euermore be true to it.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1634" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Faire Louers, you are fortunately met;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1635" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of this discourse we shall heare more anon.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1636" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Egeus</tei-hi>, I will ouer‑beare your will;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1637" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For in the Temple, by and by with vs,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1638" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These couples shall eternally be knit.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1639" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And for the morning now is something worne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1640" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Our purpos'd hunting shall be set aside.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1641" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Away, with vs to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi>; three and three,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1642" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wee'll hold a feast in great solemnitie.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1643" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hippolitæ</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Duke and Lords.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1644" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These things seeme small & vndistinguishable,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1645" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Like farre off mountaines turned into Clouds.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1646" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Me‑thinks I see these things with parted eye,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1647" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When euery things seemes double.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1648" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So me‑thinkes:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1649" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And I haue found <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Demetrius</tei-hi>, like a iewell,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1650" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Mine owne, and not mine owne.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1651" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It seemes to mee,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1652" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That yet we sleepe, we dreame. Do not you thinke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1653" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Duke was heere, and bid vs follow him?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-her" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Her.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1654" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Yea, and my Father.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hel" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hel.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1655" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hippolitæ</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1656" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And he bid vs follow to the Temple.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1657" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why then we are awake; lets follow him, and 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>by the way let vs recount our dreames.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Bottome wakes.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Louers.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Clo.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1658" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">When my cue comes, call me, and I will answer. 
                                    <tei-lb n="1659" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>My next is, most faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>. Hey ho. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter Quince</tei-hi>? 
                                    <tei-lb n="1660" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Flute</tei-hi> the bellowes‑mender? <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Snout</tei-hi> the tinker? <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Starue­
                                    <tei-lb n="1661" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ling</tei-hi>? Gods my life! Stolne hence, and left me asleepe: I
                                    <tei-lb n="1662" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>haue had a most rare vision. I had a dreame, past the wit 
                                    <tei-lb n="1663" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>of man, to say, what dreame it was. Man is but an Asse, 
                                    <tei-lb n="1664" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>if he goe about to expound this dreame. Me‑thought I 
                                    <tei-lb n="1665" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>was, there is no man can tell what. Me‑thought I was, 
                                    <tei-lb n="1666" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>and me‑thought I had. But man is but a patch'd foole, 
                                    <tei-lb n="1667" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>if he will offer to say, what me‑thought I had. The eye of 
                                    <tei-lb n="1668" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>man hath not heard, the eare of man hath not seen, mans 
                                    <tei-lb n="1669" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>hand is not able to taste, his tongue to conceiue, nor his 
                                    <tei-lb n="1670" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>heart to report, what my dreame was. I will get <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Peter 
                                    <tei-lb n="1671" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Quince</tei-hi> to write a ballet of this dreame, it shall be called 
                                    <tei-lb n="1672" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottomes Dreame</tei-hi>, because it hath no bottome; and I will 
                                    <tei-lb n="1673" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sing it in the latter end of a play, before the Duke. Per­
                                    <tei-lb n="1674" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>aduenture, to make it the more gracious, I shall sing it 
                                    <tei-lb n="1675" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>at her death.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit.</tei-stage>
                           </tei-div>
                                    <tei-div type="scene" n="2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                        <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 4, Scene 2]</tei-head>
                                <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Quince, Flute,
                                Thisbie, Snout, and Starueling.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1676" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Haue you sent to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottomes</tei-hi> house? Is he come 
                                    <tei-lb n="1677" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>home yet?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Staru.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1678" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">He cannot be heard of. Out of doubt hee is 
                                    <tei-lb n="1679" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>transported.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">
                            <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-hi> If</tei-fw>
                            <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0179-0.jpg" n="159" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                            <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1680" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">If he come not, then the play is mar'd. It goes 
                                    <tei-lb n="1681" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>not forward, doth it?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1682" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">It is not possible: you haue not a man in all
                                <tei-lb n="1683" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi>, able to discharge <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> but he.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1684" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No, hee hath simply the best wit of any handy­
                                    <tei-lb n="1685" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>craft man in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athens</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1686" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Yea, and the best person too, and hee is a very
                                <tei-lb n="1687" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Paramour, for a sweet voyce.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1688" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">You must say, Paragon. A Paramour is (God 
                                    <tei-lb n="1689" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>blesse vs) a thing of nought.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Snug the Ioyner.</tei-stage>
