                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-snu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Snug.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1690" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Masters, the Duke is comming from the Tem­
                                    <tei-lb n="1691" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ple, and there is two or three Lords & Ladies more mar­
                                    <tei-lb n="1692" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>ried. If our sport had gone forward, we had all bin made 
                                    <tei-lb n="1693" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>men.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1694" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">O sweet bully <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi>: thus hath he lost sixe­
                                    <tei-lb n="1695" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>pence a day, during his life; he could not haue scaped six­
                                    <tei-lb n="1696" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>pence a day. And the Duke had not giuen him sixpence 
                                    <tei-lb n="1697" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>a day for playing <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, Ile be hang'd. He would haue
                                    <tei-lb n="1698" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>deserued it. Sixpence a day in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, or nothing.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Bottome.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1699" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Where are these Lads? Where are these hearts?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Quin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1700" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Bottome, ô most couragious day! O most hap­
                                    <tei-lb n="1701" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>pie houre!</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1702" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Masters, I am to discourse wonders; but ask me 
                                    <tei-lb n="1703" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>not what. For if I tell you, I am no true <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Athenian</tei-hi>. I 
                                    <tei-lb n="1704" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>will tell you euery thing as it fell out.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Qu.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1705" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Let vs heare, sweet <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Bottome</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1706" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Not a word of me: all that I will tell you, is, that 
                                    <tei-lb n="1707" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>the Duke hath dined. Get your apparell together, good
                                    <tei-lb n="1708" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>strings to your beards, new ribbands to your pumps,
                                    <tei-lb n="1709" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>meete presently at the Palace, euery man looke ore his
                                    <tei-lb n="1710" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>part: for the short and the long is, our play is preferred: 
                                    <tei-lb n="1711" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>In any case let <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> haue cleane linnen: and let not him 
                                    <tei-lb n="1712" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>that playes the Lion, paire his nailes, for they shall hang 
                                    <tei-lb n="1713" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>out for the Lions clawes. And most deare Actors, eate 
                                    <tei-lb n="1714" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>no Onions, nor Garlicke; for wee are to vtter sweete 
                                    <tei-lb n="1715" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>breath, and I doe not doubt but to heare them say, it is a 
                                    <tei-lb n="1716" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sweet Comedy. No more words: away, go away.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exeunt.</tei-stage>
                        </tei-div>
                            </tei-div>
      <tei-div type="act" n="5" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                <tei-div type="scene" n="1" data-origname="div" data-origatts="n type">
                                    <tei-head rend="italic center" data-origname="head" data-origatts="rend">Actus Quintus.</tei-head>
                                    <tei-head type="supplied" data-origname="head" data-origatts="type">[Act 5, Scene 1]</tei-head>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Theseus, Hippolita, Egeus and his Lords.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1717" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">'Tis strange my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi>, y<tei-hi rend="superscript" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">t</tei-hi> these louers speake of.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1718" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">More strange then true. I neuer may beleeue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1719" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These anticke fables, nor these Fairy toyes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1720" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Louers and mad men haue such seething braines,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1721" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Such shaping phantasies, that apprehend more</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1722" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then coole reason euer comprehends.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1723" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Lunaticke, the Louer, and the Poet,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1724" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Are of imagination all compact.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1725" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">One sees more diuels then vaste hell can hold<tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="2" unit="chars" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>hold.<tei-note resp="#ES" data-origname="note" data-origatts="resp">Here a tear in the page partially obscures the final character of the line, and entirely obscures the final punctuation mark.</tei-note>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1726" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That is the mad man. The Louer, all as frantick<tei-gap rend="repair" agent="patch" extent="2" unit="chars" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>franticke,<tei-note resp="#ES" data-origname="note" data-origatts="resp">Here a paper patch obscures the end of the line</tei-note>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1727" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sees <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helens</tei-hi> beauty in a brow of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Egipt</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1728" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Poets eye in a fine frenzy rolling, doth glance</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1729" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From heauen to earth, from earth to heauen.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1730" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And as imagination bodies forth the forms of things</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1731" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vnknowne; the Poets pen turnes them to shapes,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1732" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And giues to aire nothing, a locall habitation,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1733" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And a name. Such tricks hath strong imagination,</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1734" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That if it would but apprehend some ioy,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1735" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It comprehends some bringer of that ioy.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1736" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Or in the night, imagining some feare,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1737" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Howe easie is a bush suppos'd a Beare?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1738" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But all the storie of the night told ouer,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1739" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And all their minds transfigur'd so together,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1740" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">More witnesseth than fancies images,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1741" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And growes to something of great constancie;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1742" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But howsoeuer, strange, and admirable.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter louers, Lysander, Demetrius, Hermia, 
                                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and Helena.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1743" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Heere come the louers, full of ioy and mirth:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1744" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Ioy, gentle friends, ioy and fresh dayes</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1745" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of loue accompany your hearts.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1746" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">More then to vs, waite in your royall walkes, 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>your boord, your bed.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1747" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come now, what maskes, what dances shall 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>we haue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1748" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To weare away this long age of three houres,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1749" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Between our after supper, and bed‑time?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1750" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where is our vsuall manager of mirth?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1751" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What Reuels are in hand? Is there no play,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1752" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To ease the anguish of a torturing houre?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1753" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Call <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Egeus</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ege.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1754" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Heere mighty <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Theseus</tei-hi>.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1755" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Say, what abridgement haue you for this eue­
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ning?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1756" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What maske? What musicke? How shall we beguile</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1757" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The lazie time, if not with some delight?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ege.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1758" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There is a breefe how many sports are rife:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1759" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Make choise of which your Highnesse will see first.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1760" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The battell with the Centaurs to be sung</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1761" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By an Athenian Eunuch, to the Harpe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1762" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wee'l none of that. That haue I told my Loue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1763" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In glory of my kinsman Hercules.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1764" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The riot of the tipsie Bachanals,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1765" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tearing the Thracian singer, in their rage<tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">?</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1766" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That is an old deuice, and it was plaid</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1767" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When I from <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thebes</tei-hi> came last a Conqueror.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1768" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The thrice three Muses, mourning for the death 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of learning, late deceast in beggerie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1769" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That is some Satire keene and criticall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1770" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Not sorting with a nuptiall ceremonie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1771" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A tedious breefe Scene of yong <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1772" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And his loue <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>; very tragicall mirth.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">The.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1773" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Merry and tragicall? Tedious, and briefe? That 
                                    <tei-lb n="1774" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>is, hot ice, and wondrous strange snow. How shall wee 
                                    <tei-lb n="1775" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>finde the concord of this discord?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ege.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1776" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A play there is, my Lord, some ten words long,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1777" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which is as breefe, as I haue knowne a play;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1778" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But by ten words, my Lord, it is too long;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1779" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which makes it tedious. For in all the play,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1780" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">There is not one word apt, one Player fitted.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1781" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And tragicall my noble Lord it is: for <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1782" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Therein doth kill himselfe. Which when I saw</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1783" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Rehearst, I must confesse, made mine eyes water:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1784" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But more merrie teares, the passion of loud laughter</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1785" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Neuer shed.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1786" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What are they that do play it?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ege.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1787" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hard handed men, that worke in Athens heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1788" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which neuer labour'd in their mindes till now;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1789" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And now haue toyled their vn<tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="16" unit="chars" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-note resp="#ES" data-origname="note" data-origatts="resp">Here the corner of the page is torn away, obscuring the second part of the last three lines of the column.</tei-note>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1790" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With this same play, against <tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="12" unit="chars" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1791" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-gap data-origname="gap" data-empty=""/>e will he<tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="6" unit="chars" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>
                            </tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0180-0.jpg" n="160" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                            <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-phi" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Phi.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1792" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No my noble Lord, it is not for you. I haue heard</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1793" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">It ouer, and it is nothing, nothing in the world;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1794" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Vnlesse you can finde sport in their intents,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1795" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Extreamely stretcht, and cond with cruell paine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1796" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To doe you seruice.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1797" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I will heare that play. For neuer any thing</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1798" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Can be amisse, when simplenesse and duty tender it.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1799" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Goe bring them in, and take your places, Ladies.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1800" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I loue not to see wretchednesse orecharged;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1801" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And duty in his seruice perishing.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1802" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Why gentle sweet, you shall see no such thing.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1803" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He saies, they can doe nothing in this kinde.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1804" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The kinder we, to giue them thanks for nothing</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1805" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Our sport shall be, to take what they mistake;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1806" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And what poore duty cannot doe, noble respect</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1807" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Takes it in might, not merit.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1808" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where I haue come, great Clearkes haue purposed</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1809" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To greete me with premeditated welcomes;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1810" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Where I haue seene them shiuer and looke pale,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1811" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Make periods in the midst of sentences,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1812" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Throttle their practiz'd accent in their feares,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1813" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And in conclusion, dumbly haue broke off,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1814" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Not paying me a welcome. Trust me sweete,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1815" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Out of this silence yet, I pickt a welcome:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1816" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And in the modesty of fearefull duty,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1817" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I read as much, as from the ratling tongue</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1818" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Of saucy and audacious eloquence.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1819" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Loue therefore, and tongue‑tide simplicity,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1820" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In least, speake most, to my capacity.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-ege" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Egeus.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1821" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So please your Grace, the Prologue is addrest.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Duke.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1822" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let him approach.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Flor. Trum.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter the Prologue.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Quince.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pro.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1823" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If we offend, it is with our good will.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1824" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That you should thinke, we come not to offend,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1825" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But with good will. To shew our simple skill,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1826" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That is the true beginning of our end.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1827" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Consider then, we come but in despight.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1828" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We do not come, as minding to content you,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1829" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Our true intent is. All for your delight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1830" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We are not heere. That you should here repent you,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1831" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The Actors are at hand; and by their show,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1832" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You shall know all, that you are like to know.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1833" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This fellow doth not stand vpon points.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1834" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">He hath rid his Prologue, like a rough Colt: he 
                                    <tei-lb n="1835" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>knowes not the stop. A good morall my Lord. It is not 
                                    <tei-lb n="1836" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>enough to speake, but to speake true.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Hip.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1837" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Indeed hee hath plaid on his Prologue, like a 
                                    <tei-lb n="1838" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>childe on a Recorder, a sound, but not in gouernment.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1839" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">His speech was like a tangled chaine: nothing 
                                    <tei-lb n="1840" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>impaired, but all disordered. Who is next?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Tawyer with a Trumpet before them.</tei-stage>
                                    <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pyramus and Thisby, Wall, Moone‑shine, and Lyon.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-qui" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Prol.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1841" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Gentles, perchance you wonder at this show,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1842" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But wonder on, till truth make all things plaine.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1843" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This man is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, if you would know;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1844" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This beauteous Lady, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> is certaine.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1845" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This man, with lyme and rough‑cast, doth present</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1846" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wall, that vile wall, which did these louers sunder:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1847" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And through walls chink (poor soules) they are content</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1848" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To whisper. At the which, let no man wonder.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1849" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This man, with Lanthorne, dog, and bush of thorne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1850" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="2" unit="words" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-note resp="#ES" data-origname="note" data-origatts="resp">Here the corner of the page is torn away, obscuring the first part of the last three lines of the column.</tei-note> For if you will know,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1851" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="4" unit="words" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/> Louers thinke no scorne</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1852" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-gap rend="damage" agent="tear" extent="6.4" unit="words" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="unit extent agent rend" data-empty=""/>ere, there to wooe:</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="1853" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This grizy beast (which Lyon hight by name)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1854" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The trusty <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>, comming first by night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1855" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Did scarre away, or rather did affright:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1856" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And as she fled, her mantle she did fall;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1857" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which Lyon vile with bloody mouth did staine.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1858" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Anon comes <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, sweet youth and tall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1859" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And findes his <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> Mantle slaine;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1860" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whereat, with blade, with bloody blamefull blade,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1861" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He brauely broacht his boiling bloudy breast,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1862" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>, tarrying in Mulberry shade,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1863" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">His dagger drew, and died. For all the rest,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1864" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Let <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Lyon, Moone‑shine, Wall</tei-hi>, and Louers twaine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1865" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">At large discourse, while here they doe remaine.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit all but Wall.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1866" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I wonder if the Lion be to speake.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Deme.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1867" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No wonder, my Lord: one Lion may, when 
                                    <tei-lb n="1868" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>many Asses doe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Lyon, Thisbie, and Mooneshine.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Wall.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1869" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In this same Interlude, it doth befall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1870" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I, one <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Snowt</tei-hi> (by name) present a wall:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1871" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And such a wall, as I vvould haue you thinke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1872" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That had in it a crannied hole or chinke:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1873" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Through which the Louers, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> and <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1874" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Did whisper often, very secretly.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1875" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This loame, this rough‑cast, and this stone doth shew,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1876" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That I am that same Wall; the truth is so.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1877" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And this the cranny is, right and sinister,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1878" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Through which the fearefull Louers are to whisper.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1879" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Would you desire Lime and Haire to speake 
                                    <tei-lb n="1880" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>better?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Deme.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1881" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">It is the vvittiest partition, that euer I heard
                                    <tei-lb n="1882" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>discourse, my Lord.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1883" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pyramus</tei-hi> drawes neere the Wall, silence.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pyramus.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1884" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O grim lookt night, ô night with hue so blacke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1885" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O night, which euer art, when day is not:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1886" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O night, ô night, alacke, alacke, alacke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1887" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I feare my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> promise is forgot.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1888" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And thou ô vvall, thou sweet and louely vvall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1889" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That stands between her fathers ground and mine,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1890" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thou vvall, ô vvall, ô sweet and louely vvall,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1891" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Shew me thy chinke, to blinke through vvith mine eine.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1892" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thankes courteous vvall. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ioue</tei-hi> shield thee vvell for this.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1893" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But vvhat see I? No <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> doe I see.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1894" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O vvicked vvall, through vvhom I see no blisse,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1895" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Curst be thy stones for thus deceiuing mee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Thes.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1896" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">The vvall me‑thinkes being sensible, should 
                                    <tei-lb n="1897" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>curse againe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1898" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No in truth sir, he should not. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Deceiuing me</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1899" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Is <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> cue; she is to enter, and I am to spy</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1900" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Her through the vvall. You shall see it vvill fall.</tei-l>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Thisbie.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l n="1901" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Pat as I told you; yonder she comes.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1902" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O vvall, full often hast thou heard my mones,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1903" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For parting my faire <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, and me.<tei-note resp="#PW" data-origname="note" data-origatts="resp">There is damage from here for five lines, although no text is rendered illegible due to it: a tear, repaired with a paper patch on the recto of this page.</tei-note>
                            </tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1904" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My cherry lips haue often kist thy stones;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1905" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy stones vvith Lime and Haire knit vp in thee.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pyra.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1906" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I see a voyce; now vvill I to the chinke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1907" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To spy and I can heare my <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> face. <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi>?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1908" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">My Loue thou art, my Loue I thinke.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1909" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thinke vvhat thou vvilt, I am thy Louers grace,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1910" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And like <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Limander</tei-hi> am I trusty still.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1911" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And like <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Helen</tei-hi> till the Fates me kill.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1912" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Not <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Shafalus</tei-hi> to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Procrus</tei-hi>, was so true.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1913" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Shafalus</tei-hi> to <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Procrus</tei-hi>, I to you.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">
                        <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-hi> O</tei-fw>
                            <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0181-0.jpg" n="163" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                            <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1914" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O kisse me through the hole of this vile wall.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1915" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I kisse the wals hole, not your lips at all.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1916" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Wilt thou at <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ninnies</tei-hi> tombe meete me straight 
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>way?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1917" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tide life, tide death, I come without delay.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sno" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Wall.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1918" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thus haue I <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Wall</tei-hi>, my part discharged so;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1919" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And being done, thus <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Wall</tei-hi> away doth go.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exit Clow.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1920" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Now is the morall downe betweene the two
                                <tei-lb n="1921" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Neighbors.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1922" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No remedie my Lord, when Wals are so wil­
                                    <tei-lb n="1923" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>full, to heare without vvarning.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1924" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">This is the silliest stuffe that ere I heard.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1925" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">The best in this kind are but shadowes, and the
                                    <tei-lb n="1926" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>worst are no worse, if imagination amend them.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1927" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">It must be your imagination then, & not theirs.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Duk.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1928" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">If wee imagine no worse of them then they of 
                                    <tei-lb n="1929" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>themselues, they may passe for excellent men. Here com 
                                    <tei-lb n="1930" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>two noble beasts, in a man and a Lion.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                                    <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Lyon and Moone‑shine.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-snu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lyon.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1931" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">You Ladies, you (whose gentle harts do feare</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1932" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The smallest monstrous mouse that creepes on floore)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1933" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">May now perchance, both quake and tremble heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1934" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">When Lion rough in wildest rage doth roare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1935" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Then know that I, one <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Snug</tei-hi> the Ioyner am</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1936" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A Lion fell, nor else no Lions dam:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1937" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For if I should as Lion come in strife</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1938" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Into this place, 'twere pittie of my life.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1939" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">A verie gentle beast, and of good conscience.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1940" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">The verie best at a beast, my Lord, y<tei-hi rend="superscript" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">t</tei-hi> ere I saw.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1941" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">This Lion is a verie Fox for his valor.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1942" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">True, and a Goose for his discretion.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1943" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Not so my Lord: for his valor cannot carrie 
                                    <tei-lb n="1944" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>his discretion, and the Fox carries the Goose.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1945" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">His discretion I am sure cannot carrie his valor: 
                                    <tei-lb n="1946" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>for the Goose carries not the Fox. It is well; leaue it to 
                                    <tei-lb n="1947" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>his discretion, and let vs hearken to the Moone.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Moone.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1948" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This Lanthorne doth the horned Moone pre­
                                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sent.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">De.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1949" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">He should haue worne the hornes on his head.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1950" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Hee is no crescent, and his hornes are inuisible, 
                                    <tei-lb n="1951" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>within the circumference.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Moon.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1952" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">This lanthorne doth the horned Moone pre­
                                    <tei-lb n="1953" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>sent: My selfe, the man i'th Moone doth seeme to be.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1954" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">This is the greatest error of all the rest; the man
                                    <tei-lb n="1955" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>should be put into the Lanthorne. How is it els the man
                                    <tei-lb n="1956" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>i'th Moone?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1957" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">He dares not come there for the candle.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1958" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For you see, it is already in snuffe.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1959" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I am vvearie of this Moone; vvould he would 
                                    <tei-lb n="1960" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>change.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1961" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">It appeares by his smal light of discretion, that 
                                    <tei-lb n="1962" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>he is in the wane: but yet in courtesie, in all reason, vve
                                    <tei-lb n="1963" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>must stay the time.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1964" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Proceed Moone.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-sta" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Moon.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1965" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">All that I haue to say, is to tell you, that the
                                    <tei-lb n="1966" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Lanthorne is the Moone; I, the man in the Moone; this
                                    <tei-lb n="1967" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>thorne bush, my thorne bush; and this dog, my dog.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1968" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Why all these should be in the Lanthorne: for <tei-lb n="1969" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>they are in
                                    the Moone. But silence, heere comes <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Thisby.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1970" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This is old <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Ninnies</tei-hi> tombe: where is my loue?</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-snu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lyon.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1971" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Oh.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">The Lion roares, Thisby runs off.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1972" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well roar'd Lion.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1973" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Well run <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1974" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Well shone Moone.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1975" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Truly the Moone shines with a good grace.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1976" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Wel mouz'd Lion.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1977" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">And then came <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="1978" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">And so the Lion vanisht.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Piramus.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pyr.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1979" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Sweet Moone, I thank thee for thy sunny beames,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1980" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I thanke thee Moone, for shining now so bright:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1981" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">For by thy gracious, golden, glittering beames,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1982" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I trust to taste of truest <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> sight.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1983" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">But stay: O spight! but marke, poore Knight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1984" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">What dreadful dole is heere?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1985" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Eyes do you see! How can it be!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1986" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O dainty Ducke: O Deere!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1987" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thy mantle good; what staind with blood!</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1988" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Approch you Furies fell:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1989" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O Fates! come, come: Cut thred and thrum,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1990" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Quaile, crush, conclude, and quell.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1991" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This passion, and the death of a deare friend,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1992" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Would go neere to make a man looke sad.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1993" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Beshrew my heart, but I pittie the man.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Pir.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="1994" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O wherefore Nature, did'st thou Lions frame?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1995" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Since Lion vilde hath heere deflour'd my deere:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1996" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Which is: no, no, which was the fairest Dame</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1997" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That liu'd, that lou'd, that lik'd, that look'd with cheere.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1998" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come teares, confound: Out sword, and wound</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="1999" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The pap of <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2000" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I, that left pap, where heart doth hop;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2001" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thus dye I, thus, thus, thus.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2002" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now am I dead, now am I fled, my soule is in the sky,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2003" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tongue lose thy light, Moone take thy flight,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2004" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now dye, dye, dye, dye, dye.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2005" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No Die, but an ace for him; for he is but one.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
