                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lis.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2006" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Lesse then an ace man. For he is dead, he is no­
                                    <tei-lb n="2007" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>thing.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Du.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2008" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">With the helpe of a Surgeon, he might yet reco­
                                    <tei-lb n="2009" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>uer, and proue an Asse.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2010" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">How chance Moone‑shine is gone before?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2011" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> comes backe, and findes her Louer.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Thisby.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Duke.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2012" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">She wil finde him by starre‑light.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2013" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Heere she comes, and her passion ends the play.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-hip" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dut.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2014" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Me thinkes shee should not vse a long one for 
                                    <tei-lb n="2015" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>such a <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>: I hope she will be breefe.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2016" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">A Moth wil turne the ballance, which <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> 
                                <tei-lb n="2017" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>which <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisby</tei-hi> is the better.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-lys" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Lys.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2018" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">She hath spyed him already, with those sweete 
                                    <tei-lb rend="turnover" n="2019" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n rend" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-pc rend="turnover" data-origname="pc" data-origatts="rend">(</tei-pc>eyes.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Dem.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2020" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">And thus she meanes, <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">videlicit</tei-hi>.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-flu" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">This.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2021" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Asleepe my Loue? What, dead my Doue?</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2022" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi> arise:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2023" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Speake, Speake. Quite dumbe? Dead, dead? A tombe</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2024" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Must couer thy sweet eyes.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2025" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These Lilly Lips, this cherry nose,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2026" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">These yellow Cowslip cheekes</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2027" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Are gone, are gone: Louers make mone:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2028" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">His eyes were greene as Leekes.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2029" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">O sisters three, come, come to mee,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2030" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With hands as pale as Milke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2031" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Lay them in gore, since you haue shore</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2032" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">With sheeres, his thred of silke.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2033" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Tongue not a word: Come trusty sword:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2034" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Come blade, my brest imbrue:</tei-l>
                                <tei-fw type="sig" place="footCentre" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">O3</tei-fw>
                                <tei-fw type="catchword" place="footRight" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="place type">And</tei-fw>
                                <tei-pb facs="FFimg:axc0182-0.jpg" n="162" data-origname="pb" data-origatts="n facs" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-fw type="rh" data-origname="fw" data-origatts="type">A Midsommer nights Dreame.</tei-fw>
                                <tei-cb n="1" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="2035" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And farwell friends, thus <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbie</tei-hi> ends;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2036" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Adieu, adieu, adieu.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Duk.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2037" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">Moone‑shine & Lion are left to burie the dead.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-dem" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Deme.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2038" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">I, and Wall too.</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-bot" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Bot.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2039" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No, I assure you, the wall is downe, that parted 
                                    <tei-lb n="2040" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>their Fathers. Will it please you to see the Epilogue, or 
                                    <tei-lb n="2041" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>to heare a Bergomask dance, betweene two of our com­
                                    <tei-lb n="2042" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>pany?</tei-p>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-duk" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Duk.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-p n="2043" data-origname="p" data-origatts="n">No Epilogue, I pray you; for your play needs 
                                    <tei-lb n="2044" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>no excuse. Neuer excuse; for when the plaiers are all 
                                    <tei-lb n="2045" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>dead, there need none to be blamed. Marry, if hee that 
                                    <tei-lb n="2046" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>writ it had plaid <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Piramus</tei-hi>, and hung himselfe in <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Thisbies</tei-hi> 
                                    <tei-lb n="2047" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>garter, it would haue beene a fine Tragedy: and so it is 
                                    <tei-lb n="2048" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>truely, and very notably discharg'd. But come, your
                                    <tei-lb n="2049" data-origname="lb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>Burgomaske; let your Epilogue alone.</tei-p>
                                    <tei-l n="2050" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The iron tongue of midnight hath told twelue.</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2051" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Louers to bed, 'tis almost Fairy time.</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2052" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I feare we shall out‑sleepe the comming morne,</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2053" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">As much as we this night haue ouer‑watcht.</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2054" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">This palpable grosse play hath well beguil'd</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2055" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">The heauy gate of night. Sweet friends to bed.</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2056" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">A fortnight hold we this solemnity.</tei-l>
                                    <tei-l n="2057" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In nightly Reuels; and new iollitie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic rightJustified" type="exit" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Exeunt.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter Pucke.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Puck</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2058" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now the hungry Lyons rores,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2059" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And the Wolfe beholds the Moone:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2060" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whilest the heauy ploughman snores,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2061" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">All with weary taske fore‑done.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2062" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now the wasted brands doe glow,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2063" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Whil'st the scritch‑owle, scritching loud,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2064" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Puts the wretch that lies in woe,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2065" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In remembrance of a shrowd.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2066" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now it is the time of night,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2067" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That the graues, all gaping wide,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2068" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Euery one lets forth his spright,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2069" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">In the Church‑way paths to glide,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2070" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And we Fairies, that do runne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2071" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By the triple <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Hecates</tei-hi> teame,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2072" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">From the presence of the Sunne,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2073" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Following darkenesse like a dreame,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2074" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now are frollicke; not a Mouse</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2075" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Shall disturbe this hallowed house.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2076" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">I am sent with broome before,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2077" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To sweep the dust behinde the doore.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="entrance" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">Enter King and Queene of Fairies, with their traine.</tei-stage>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-obe" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Ob.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2078" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Through the house giue glimmering light,</tei-l>
                                <tei-cb n="2" data-origname="cb" data-origatts="n" data-empty=""/>
                                <tei-l n="2079" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">By the dead and drowsie fier,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2080" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Euerie Elfe and Fairie spright,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2081" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hop as light as bird from brier,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2082" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And this Ditty after me, sing and dance it trippinglie.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-tit" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Tita.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2083" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">First rehearse this song by roate,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2084" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">To each word a warbling note.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2085" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Hand in hand, with Fairie grace,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2086" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Will we sing and blesse this place.</tei-l>
                                <tei-stage rend="italic center" type="business" data-origname="stage" data-origatts="type rend">The Song.</tei-stage>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2087" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Now vntill the breake of day,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2088" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Through this house each Fairy stray.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2089" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">To the best Bride‑bed will we,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2090" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Which by vs shall blessed be:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2091" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">And the issue there create,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2092" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Euer shall be fortunate:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2093" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">So shall all the couples three,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2094" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Euer true in louing be:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2095" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">And the blots of Natures hand,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2096" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Shall not in their issue stand.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2097" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Neuer mole, harelip, nor scarre,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2098" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Nor marke prodigious, such as are</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2099" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Despised in Natiuitie,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2100" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Shall vpon their children be.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2101" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">With this field dew consecrate,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2102" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Euery Fairy take his gate,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2103" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">And each seuerall chamber blesse,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2104" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Through this Pallace with sweet peace,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2105" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Euer shall in safety rest,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2106" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">And the owner of it blest.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2107" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Trip away, make no stay;</tei-l>
                                <tei-l rend="italic" n="2108" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n rend">Meet me all by breake of day.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                            <tei-sp who="#F-mnd-puc" data-origname="sp" data-origatts="who">
                                <tei-speaker rend="italic" data-origname="speaker" data-origatts="rend">Robin.</tei-speaker>
                                <tei-l n="2109" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If we shadowes haue offended,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2110" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Thinke but this (and all is mended)</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2111" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">That you haue but slumbred heere,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2112" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">While these visions did appeare.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2113" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And this weake and idle theame,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2114" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">No more yeelding but a dreame,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2115" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">
                                <tei-choice data-origname="choice">
                                    <tei-orig data-origname="orig">Centles</tei-orig>
                                    <tei-corr data-origname="corr">Gentles</tei-corr>
                                </tei-choice>, doe not reprehend.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2116" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If you pardon, we will mend.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2117" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And as I am an honest <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pucke</tei-hi>,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2118" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">If we haue vnearned lucke,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2119" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Now to scape the Serpents tongue,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2120" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">We will make amends ere long:</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2121" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Else the <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Pucke</tei-hi> a lyar call.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2122" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">So good night vnto you all.</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2123" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">Giue me your hands, if we be friends,</tei-l>
                                <tei-l n="2124" data-origname="l" data-origatts="n">And <tei-hi rend="italic" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rend">Robin</tei-hi> shall restore amends.</tei-l>
                            </tei-sp>
                        </tei-div>
                            </tei-div>
                        <tei-trailer data-origname="trailer">FINIS.</tei-trailer>          
                        </tei-div>
                </tei-body>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
